The dress is absolutely stunning in person, and looks exactly as it is pictured!

However, practical elements does bring the rating down. The seller says that they will customize the dress, but when we finally received it, not only was it very obvious that the dress was not customized to the measurements we sent, but it was 2 sizes too large. We had to spend over $100 to have the dress altered. The lacing for the corseted bodice was also very flimsy, and required replacement.

Another thing of note, the corset lacing in the back of the bodice is not ornamental, it is functional. There are no hooks or zippers in the back to tighten the bodice (we had to ask the seamstress to add some), the only way to do that is by tightening the lacing in the back.

Once the dress was altered and  the ribbon replaced, the dress was a showstopper. I just don't care for a seller to promote a service that isn't actually offered.
summary: The Dress Itself Is Worth 5 Stars but...

The jacket meets my basic standards, but there's definitely some room for improvement quality-wise. The ribbed cotton fabric at the waist, wrists, and neck, is a bit too "loose" feeling. Some more elastic would definitely help these spots, as I feel that these bits of the jacket should feel more snug than they do. The zipper on the jacket is also of low quality, resulting in a bit of a struggle when I try to zip the jacket up. Finally, the fit is a bit off for me--but that could be more of a problem due to my size. I'm 6'2 and about 165 lbs. (a fairly slim guy. The jacket definitely meets the slim fit I'm looking for, but unfortunately the arms are a bit too short for my arms, resulting in the jacket arms creeping back fairly often when I extend my arms.

If you're interested in this sort of jacket, and need to buy one on a budget--this one should fit the bill. But if you're willing to throw in the 30-40 bucks that most jackets of this style require, I'd recommend you do that.
summary: Basic Jacket with Room for Improvement

I think for the price it's totally fair since some Lego sets this big cost over 100 bucks. I would recomemd. this set to anyone. I received this at a discounted price for my honest review

This was a fun build. The box is super strong with reinforced cardboard inside. The bricks don't come in numbered bags but I like that because it reminds me of old school legos. The instruction book is well made and the instructions are fairly easy they do tend to lay down quite a few bricks in one step to avoid having too many steps. So sometime there is a lot to do with just one step. But other than that the instructions are easy to understand. I do like that Wange does tell you which of the printed bricks goes where. I tried some other brands and they forget to tell you that part in the instructions. These are the best non-lego bricks I've come across in terms of build quality. The minifigs stand out a little but aren't that noticeable if you have many minifigs for them to hide among.

reviewText: I purchased these cubes before flying on a vacation where I knew I would need clothes for both hot and rather cool temperatures.  Knowing that i would be packing more items than usual in the same space, the packing cubes looked like the way to go, and they were great!  I used one for tops folded on a home-made folding board, and a second one for rolled pants and a long skirt.  Underwear was packed in a separate, smaller cube I already owned, and shoes, socks, hair styling tools, etc were packed around the edge.  I was limited to one rolling carry-on plus one personal item that would fit under the airline seat, and with the cubes I managed to organize and pack everything efficiently.  Wrinkling was held to a minimum and only required a slight sprinkle of water and temporary hanging to look fresh.  It was easy to pack and repack at different locations, and because everything was so compact and well organized, I never misplaced anything, nor did I stress over inspections by airport security.  I will continue to use these packing cubes on future vacations, and I consider them well worth the modest cost I paid for them.

I got the "rose" which is much prettier than it looks in the picture.  It's almost a coral and the wide black zippers and black mesh makes a nice contrast.  The fabric has a diamond pattern which gives it a glossy, shimmery finish. Very elegant.

I also like the sizes.  You get two large bags (15 23" x 12 3/4") and two medium bags (13 3/4" x 10 3/4".)  Since all are a generous 4" deep, you can pack plenty of stuff without having to cram it in.

They're well made.  Rip-stop nylon holds up to a LOT of rough wear and the wide, double zippers are sturdy.  They also have substantial pulls so you can easily locate and use them.  The interior seams are bound, which is a nice touch.  Each bag has a handle on the top.  The handles are fine for me, but they are smallish.  Take note if you have large hands.

And the twist?  Most packing cubes come with a partial mesh panel (usually in two or four corners.)  Two of these (one large, one medium) have a full mesh panel and two have no mesh at all.  I was surprised at this, but I can see that it could have some advantages.  Obviously, the advantage of mesh panels is that you can see what's in the bag without opening it.  The disadvantage is that everyone else can also see what's in there.

So it comes down to this.  If you decide to leave your heavy suitcase in the truck and just take a "cube" with your overnight necessities into your room, do you mind if everyone in the parking lot, lobby, and hall sees your underwear?  If you're of the "if you've got it, flaunt it" mindset, you'll use the cubes with full mesh.  If you think that's too much "sharing" you'll be happier with the closed ones.  With this set, it's your choice.

Actually, there's another consideration.  Many of us now use packing cubes to store out-of season or infrequently-worn clothing. The bags with no mesh are better for that purpose because they keep out dust.

I think being able to choose the mesh or non-mesh is an asset. It's a nice set of sturdy, well-made, roomy packing cubes at a bargain price.

Free sample provided for review.
summary: Very attractive packing cubes with an interesting twist

reviewText:
Packing cubes are a great asset when you are traveling. I previously purchased a set that I have used several times and found them quite useful. I readily agreed to accept this set for free in exchange for an honest review.

There are four packing cubes in this set (I have the blue), two of one size and two of another. I was surprised to see that two have a mesh side (great for seeing what is in the cube) and two are solid. (One of each type in each size.) I would have preferred all of them to have mesh.

Each cube has a handle for carrying individually and adequate depth for bulky clothing like sweaters. The material is polyester and the zippers seem adequate to the job. (I haven't used the cubes for traveling yet, but I am going to take them on a trip in February and will let you know how they worked.)

The reason I gave this four stars instead of five is two-fold.

First, I was disappointed that there was not a see-through mesh for all of them. That is important when you are rooting through your luggage looking for a particular item.

Second, these cubes feel flimsy.

However, they are reasonably priced and roomy.
summary: A Nice Set for the Price

reviewText:
When this swimsuit arrived I was so excited. I really love the look and colors. The black online on the blue suit is perfect, in my opinion.  I ordered a small (size 4-6) since most of my clothing is a size 4 or small or x-small.  The top fits me perfectly, it's nice that it has the straps that can be added or removed. They don't offer a lot of support, but I imagine that they would keep it from falling off if you were actively swimming or diving into the water.  The bottoms on the other hand are WAY too tiny. I honestly can't guess what size it would fit. Maybe a size 0? I included 2 photos. One photo is the bottoms from this size small over a pair of bottoms from a size Xsmall that I wear occasionally. You can see that these small are considerably smaller than a pair of Xsmall swim bottoms.  Since the top and bottom come as a pair it may be difficult to find the perfect size unless you are a larger size on top and smaller on the bottom.  It is unfortunate because I was excited to wear this suit this summer.
While I received this product at a discount, all opinions in this review are my own.

reviewText: Not suitable for snow. Hands got wet and cold almost immediately after use. I'm sure they will be fine for cold weather as long as you don't get them wet or handle snow. The gloves frayed at the finger tips on the first use. Ordered two pairs. Returning the unused pair since used items cannot be returned.

Winter cycling in Boston is no joke, my lined leather gloves did not cut it. When conditions were wet or sub-zero, my fingers were freezing.

These, by contrast, kept me going through a recent equipment failure in the pouring rain at 0 degrees C. Substantially waterproof and lined with water-wicking fleece, if they hadn't performed well, I'd probably be in the hospital.

Highly recommended and the pink/rose is nice, too.

UPDATE TO REVIEW: !6 January Unfortunately, the stitching gave out on these after only a week's wear. I'm so disappointed! I would have liked a replacement pair but I could only get a refund.

reviewText: When i first saw this necklace, the only thing i thought was wow thats beautiful,  i have to have it. Because i did not fully read the description, i had no idea it was silicon.  I thought it was going to be heave or bulky.  Its completely soft.  The entire necklace is soft. I love that.  To me that means it is child proof.  No small parts to get stuck with.  The necklace came in the beautiful package.  It has the story of the company. Since i missed the part about the necklace being made of silicon, i just had to read this package from front to back.  Another fact that i did not know about this necklace is that it is made of recycled items.  I absolutely love this piece.  It is so beautiful and light.  I love the story behind the company as well.  Thank you guys for this opportunity.  I look forward to more purchases in the future.  I received this product in exchange for my honest unbiased review.

reviewText: This bag does work great for Spirit Airlines, though it does seem kind of small inside once I put my 15" laptop in there. Because it has wheels and a handle, they take up some of the space that could be used for packing...but I got sick of carrying my heavy laptop and bag all through the airports. I took this bag on a trip to Orlando. It was a business conference for 3 days, then 2 days at the beach and NASA with my boyfriend who came out to meet me. I wore jeans, a sweater, shirt and shoes that were casual or could be worn with a suit. I packed one suit, with 3 dress shirts, sandals, bikini, 3 casual tech/synthetic fabric shirts (they pack up smaller), a casual skirt, casual capris, socks & underwear, toiletries and had space to stuff in my purse since I was using this bag as the personal item on Spirit! Overall....it was a tight squeeze, but possible! And saved me a bunch on $$ on baggage fees.
summary: Great bag for Spirit, though a tight squeeze for longer trips or winter clothes...

reviewText: This carry on is the perfect size. I was able to fit one packing cube of clothes (in case the airline loses my checked bag because experience), a sweatshirt, my laptop, and some other random things. I love that I can either roll the bag with the handle, carry with the shoulder strap, or with the hand straps. It also has a strap on the back that can go over another suitcase's telescope handle which makes travel easy. Very pleased!

This should have run large on me but I could barely even get it zipped and I was wearing a thin shirt.
To me, this coat is not worth the $79.99 price tag as shown on Amazon. It seems more like a $30 item that I could get from an Aeropostale or another store for tweens/teens. I am going to be returning this coat.

reviewText: I love the ease of this seatbelt. We have a complicated harness seat belt that is quite the process to get on when you have an uncooperative pup. If we are just making a quick short trip we can just attach it to her collar. For longer trips, we can attach it to the back of the harness. Much faster than the tether strap. I like the adjustable length as well.  It's worked well for our furry family member!  I received this item at a discounted price in exchange for an honest review.
summary: I love the ease of this seatbelt

reviewText:
The Bluesky pet car seat belt works great to keep my dog secured in his seat while riding in the car. I have a harness for him to wear when he is in the car. The clip on the pet seat belt hooks on the loop that is on the harness. The square end on the pet seat belt that looks like a buckle clips right into the seat belt buckle on my car. I adjusted it for his height and hooked him in. The seat belt helped keep him from jumping around in the back seat. The whole system keeps my dog secure in his seat.
I received this at a reduced price for my honest review.
summary: Secures my dog in his seat.

reviewText:
My pup is the rare breed who actually doesn't care for car rides, no matter how short or long. She gets pretty antsy, pacing back and forth, falling off the seat (are my seat covers too slippery for her paws?) Besides that, I'm concerned about er safety in an accident, and for that matter, ours as well. She'd become a projectile in the event of an accident, and I really didn't want her hitting me in the back of the head at forty miles per hour.

I used this in conjunction with a harness that goes around her torso, rather than just a collar. That way, if we do stop suddenly (this is Florida, it happens all the time) when we get cut off, she isn't getting pulled by her neck. Maybe that doesn't bother dogs so much, but it always makes me cringe.

this works like any leash on the leash end, and clips right into the seatbelts in both of the cars I've used so far. Considering how expensive veterinary bills can be, I consider this an excellent investment.
I received a discount on this product in exchange for promising to write a fair and thoughtful review.
summary: With a harness, the best safety I can get for my dog

reviewText:
I ordered this top in blue and its just ok even though I wanted to love it.  I normally wear a US size 2 so I ordered a small. The top didn't fit me all that well.  It felt fine in the body of the shirt, but the arms are short and extremely tight.

The materials used for this top seem to be good quality and are soft.  The strip of lace that runs down the back is a nice touch.  The blues in the top are slightly different colors with the top portion being lighter than the stripes below.  There are some minor gathering spots where the different pieces are sewn together, but once the top is on they aren't as noticeable.  Overall this top is just ok, I won't be able to wear it as the arms are far too tight.

reviewText: This shirt is really cute! I read some reviews on here that would suggest you size up and you could either do that or if you're looking for a tighter fit then you could order your normal size. For me, I normally wear a Medium or Large depending on the brand. I ordered an XL and I am glad I did because the arms fit tighter than the rest of the garment does and I have fairly thin arms. The back of this shirt is really adorable and adds a special quality to this shirt. I am 5'5 inches tall and the back covers my rear so it could easily be paired with leggings or jeggings. I chose to wear it with jeans and that works too. The white parts of this fabric are slightly see-through but not to the point you'd feel embarrassed and I didn't feel the need to wear an undershirt. There are some strings hanging from the garment in stitching areas but none that would make the garment unwearable if you clip them. The fabric is lightweight and airy, except for the tight arms. The arms go down past my wrist but with movement can ride up slightly.. no biggie. Overall, I am extremely happy with my purchase and would purchase again from this company and even the same shirt in another color. I received this product at a discount for my unbiased review.

I really like this top. This is a cotton blend shirt with lace down the back. It comes in Wine and Dark Blue. I chose the dark blue. It is very light and comfortable, goes on easily and hangs very nice. It is a bit longer in the back, which is great when you pair it with leggings. I put it on with a pair of light colored blue jeans and it looked really nice. Casual yet a bit dressy. Keep in mind that Asian sizes run smaller than US sizes, so order accordingly. The XL is a US size 10-12. This top is a bit thin also, so I would wear a white or beige tank top underneath it, especially in the fall or spring when it's a bit cooler out. All in all I like this shirt, very comfy and quite attractive. I received this item at a discount for the purpose of my HONEST and UNBIASED review. All opinions expressed are my own.

reviewText: Cool design, well made
Perfect

After seeing 5 star reviews online for this style miraclesuit, I had to try it.  I'm really bummed this didn't fit me well at all.  For the record, It's a very nice, well-made sporty suit.  I'm a broad, well-proportioned 5'9" 195 lbs woman with long legs, usually wear an XL, 14-16 in clothes.  I ordered a 16 as many miraclesuit reviewers say to "order up"..  The suit arrived and its HUGE!  Boobs are way too big (and I'm a 38C), the torso's way too long, and the rucheing in the middle gives me a pear shape as opposed to enhancing my hourglass figure.  I'm assuming the suit is just too big and maybe I'm a 14?  But this was so unflattering on that I didn't even want to try to order a 14.  I ordered another size 16 miraclesuit style and I had the exact same fit issues with that one as well, giving me a pear shape, etc..  Many women just love these suits but they are not for me.  I tried on a Magicsuit at Macy's and the 16 fits more like a true 16.

All that said, I love Amazon for easy order, easy returns and am grateful I can order online and not be committed to my purchase.

Hope this helps!

This is my favorite wallet ever! I haven't used a regular wallet in years, these wallets force you to keep the wallet clean and light. My old wallets would have all kinds of cards, receipts, etc stuffed into it. So I basically buy these wallets for the convenience, no the RFID protection. So the previous wallets I purchased were cheap, lasted about 6 months or so, got dented and dinged, and would eventually fall apart. No big deal they were cheap, just bought a new one. Well, the time came that I needed a new wallet, saw the SHARKK and thought, nice, but way too expensive for one of these wallets. But after looking at all the cheap ones I decided, what the heck, I'll give it a try. I'm so glad I did! It is noticeably heavier than the ones I had used in the past, good sign, seamed sturdier. Well, 9 months later and it is holding up great, it's very sturdy. It closes very tight, nice and secure. The finish can take lots of abuse. I keep it in my pocket with my keys, but some how it is not all scratched up like my previous wallets. It has one tiny scratch on the front, and the paint has worn off around the edges, but it still looks great. So the question I've seen come up a lot is how many cards can it hold? I have 9 cards in it and it closes nice and tight, no bulging. I can probably get a card or two more in it before it would start to bulge. If you are considering a wallet like this, pay the extra money, so worth it. Well made, great latch for a secure closing wallet. So I've commented about it closing well, that is because over time, the other wallets wouldn't close properly. I highly recommend this wallet, stop wasting money on the cheap ones and buy this one.
summary: Spend the money and get a quality, well made wallet... I'm so glad I did!

reviewText: I love this wallet.  It's my third.  The inner card holders in the original ones were very cheap and tore easily.  They replaced my wallet twice (lifetime guarantee) and the last one I got, had a much sturdier, wider accordion holder which has now lasted almost a year.  So yes, it's now a good product, and a very responsible manufacturer.  I have no idea if it's protecting my cards from wifi electronic theft, but since I haven't had any bogus charges, so I'll assume it's working.

reviewText:
I NEVER buy sterling-always gold but
I saw these exquisite carved shell earrings that I knew would be perfect with a lace jacket I was wearing to a wedding. The carving is lovely & the sterling workmanship perfect. They are natural
& reflective & unique & a great buy.

The color white on earrings are normally my least favorite unless they're pearls or mother of pearl. This earring completely delivers on that ground. There is no hesitation when you see this pair that it could be something else but pearl. Also what you see in the online image is what you get. Since this pair looks very sophisticated yet simple, they could be worn with business formal to daily casual. In that sense, they're extremely versatile. So why did I knock down one star? The length. The website does not state anywhere the length of these earrings. So I had to measure them when I received them and they come to two inches. I personally like my earrings to be slightly longer and I may have looked at other Bali Bay Trading's collection for a longer pair. In any case, I decided to keep this pair for their very unique design but I would really prefer knowing the length before a purchase.
These earrings are beautiful and exactly as advertised.  They are a true white mother of pearl, and I love the length.

reviewText:
As another review notes, these did not arrive as pictured. Instead I received a pair that look like some cringe-worthy white girl attempt at Mesoamerican appropriation. In addition, one dented almost immediately, and that's saying a lot as someone who is told repeatedly that she is too gentle with things. The dent doesn't inhibit wear, but it isn't very aesthetically appealing (much like the design).

HOWEVER, these redeemed themselves a bit for me because they're so small. In my search for reliable nipple jewelry, my small chest and long hair haven't been kind. There's a lot of snagging, pulling, bleeding, you know. Dreadfully uncomfortable. The jewelry posts are always, ALWAYS too long to wear comfortably. But these are perfect! They fit like they were made for me and, regardless of design, I highly recommend them if you're looking for something reliable and small.

Worked great.  Worked as described.

While I'm not a young girl, women's sized underwear is exceedingly large on me, so I have to buy children's sizes. I'm around ~100lbs, and got the large, and these fit great. For reference, I'm usually a size 10 in the hanes brand of girls underwear, the L size in these is pretty similar size-wise, if not a tad smaller/snugger. These are basically a "hipster" cut pantie. Overall these are quite comfy and well made. No loose stitching anywhere, the elastic is not rough but very smooth and soft. These are pretty cute as well, and have very faint polka dots that are not visible in the picture. They came in a nice re-sealable bag with some roses on it too, and a bunny hair-tie was included as an extra gift, how nice!

Although the directions say to buy a size larger for "growing girls", I might recommend against that if you're buying these specifically for "that time of the month", as a snugger pair of underwear helps menstrual pads stay in place better. I wasn't really sure at first why these were specifically mentioning periods - but there's actually an additional liner that covers both the crotch area and a good portion of the back of the pantie as well to prevent break-through bleeding.

UPDATE: My periods are irregular, so I recently had a "surprise visitor" overnight, luckily I happened to be wearing these, and although admittedly I didn't bleed all that much, the blood spots were not visible from the outside... so, the liner does work! I could see that being useful to prevent embarrassment in the gym locker room, etc. should a young girl have the same issue with irregular periods.

I would have liked for the secondary liner to extend further forward. I also felt that the buttons on the front, while cute, cause a little discomfort due to the thread sticking out quite a bit on the inside where they are attached.

Overall, these are great, pretty comfy, cute, and made well - I'd definitely recommend them.

I received this product in exchange for writing a review.
summary: Cute, comfy, made well, contains additional lining on inside to prevent bleed-through, recommended

reviewText:
When I saw these panties I was interested in them for my young teenage granddaughters.

The  panties come in a pack of four.  They are made very well and are good quality.  The panties have a liner that runs from the front crotch area to the back where it widens out  then narrows again as it approaches the waist.

The sizing for me is iffy...I have two young teenage grandchildren, both of them are very small and petite and so I ordered the size large.  I will not know till later on the fit.....and will adjust the review if the panties are to small for them, but they are quite stretchy and I think t hey are going to be fine.

I took one pair of the panties and tossed them into the wash.. .then into the dryer and found that they washed up beautifully and did not shrink, they maintained their shape and size.  I laid them on top of a new pair and they lined up as though they were new.

The colors are pretty... I have the gray and blue.  The elasticity seems fine in the waist and legs and the panties themselves are stretchy.

All in all .. for right now I cannot see anything negative about them.. but I will be delivering the panties today and will update this if they do not fit.
But for now...

I have included photos that show the measurement of the panties so you may be able to figure from the measurements how the panties may fit and whether to go with a large or xtra large.

-it fits loose, so its not great for apple shapes or any shape that needs a bit of fitting in certain areas. If you have a naturally slender shape in the waist/torso area, youll probably look fine. Otherwise, it hangs like a shift dress.

-the sleeves are too long! You could try to roll them up though.

-the material is very nice and warm, and the flower pattern beneath is beautiful and bold.

-Im 53 and it hits at the knees. You can wear this as a dress if you're short. The problem is that its so warm, I cant see wearing it in hot weather. It might be a nice spring or autumn dress. I tried it with leggings and it looked funny cuz the dress itself is a little long on me to be a tunic.

- i sent a message to the seller for a possible return/refund. They were extremely helpful, agreed to credit me back half the price with no return (theyre inChina), and were very responsive.

-its dry clean only.

reviewText: This top came much earlier than the shipping prediction. The grey over-lay part is fairly soft and warm, but is still a light layer, so not too warm to wear inside in winter. The underlay is a non-stretchy cotton, nice and thick and a soft feel but with no give at all. If I was to change anything, it would be to make the underlay as stretchy as the top, but it works okay and doesn't pull funny and fits as predicted.  The pockets look higher on me than on the cute, skinny model --- I bought the 3X and it just fits with no roominess. According to my husband and teen girls, though, it looks fine and doesn't make me look any rounder than I already am, so I call that a win! I am only 5' 2" and the top reaches well down my thighs. I wore it all day and it was comfortable through errands and housework. Overall, I'd say the top iss decent quality, attractive and well made, shipping was speedier than predicted, I wear a US 3X and this 3X fit the same, and it was warm without being too toasty.

reviewText: Love it!

This is a good base dress to bring to your tailor and have them fit it to your measurements. I'm bustier, 170 lbs and I ordered the extra large and this was way too baggy on me. However I had my tailor take it in all the right places added a satin bow Sash and a shrug and it was pretty cute for what I needed it for. I would say I was a little surprised that the bottom wasn't hemmed at all and it was very Jagged. So it definitely needed a lot of work on the hemline. The picture is after tailoring with a shrug.

I was worried how the dress would actually look like in person, but picture does not do it justice. LOVE the dress. I was also worried about sizing, I wear 18/20 US sizing & ordered the 2x and it was roomy, I could put the dress on and off without the zipper. I could probably have gone one size down but it was still very comfortable and I didn't want to return and reorder. The dress is too beautiful, I wanted to wear it ASAP!  Beautiful details of lace fabric, color is white and be prepared to get a lot of compliments when wearing the dress. I haven't washed it but looks like it would be handwash & air dry or else the lace detailings will rip.

These are my first pair of Fly London shoes.  I never heard of Fly London before but I notice that Nordstrom carries this brand, so they are definitely not on the "budget" end if you are shopping under the $100 price tag (can be pricey - got these at a good price compared to the other colors they come in at $179).  The "FLY" logo on the shoe can be a turnoff (corny) but not that noticeable because these are in off white (manufactures/designers have a need to put a signature stamp on fashion these days).  I was tempted to skip ordering them after asking my daughter if she like the style (a quick NO with a head shake...she's 23).  Anyway, after contemplating clicking the "submit" button...I decided to do it, and I am glad I did.  I typically wear a size 10, however, I ordered these in the 40 (9-9.5) since that was the only size available.  They fit perfectly and are so easy to walk in.  I was concerned that they would not be as comfortable considering I went down in sizing, but they are so comfortable.  I luv these unique little shoes for the summer.  I will be keeping an eye on Fly London!

This is a very pretty. The black belt made the dress casual looking. Had to order a white beaded belt from another place to go with the the dress because it definitely need a belt or sash. The smaller size would have been too small.

reviewText: This dress fit perfectly.  I am 6ft tall and it hit me at my knees.  Unlike the pictures that I have seen in the reviews, this dress looks exactly as it is picured here; it is A-Line in the skirt and fitted in the bodice.  I need it for a sorority ritual and it demure and conservative.  I paired it with a crinoline and it gives it a little more fullness.  This is not the most stylish dress, but it fits my needs,  It also came with a patent leather black belt to wear with it, which adds even more flair to the dress.  The dress is packaged appropriately, folded neatly in a heavy plastic pouch (that I will be reusing as a wet bag in my babies' diaper bag).  It was pretty wrinkled, but no biggie.  The quality of the material is good.  Overall, great value and workmanship for the price.  Additionally, I got same day shipping and received the package the next day.  Perfect timing.  Perfect seller.
summary: It was pretty wrinkled, but no biggie

The adorable daffodil color was just what I wanted to match that renowned Navy blue and Gold! The fabric is light and breathable, and has a nice cotton feel. The size large is a little roomy on me, but I'm going to give the dress a nice warm wash and see if it shrinks a little. Thankfully the tie belt will help bring in the bit of roominess. This is a review for the Colombian Latex Short Torso Sports Workout Waist Trainer Cincher with 3 Hook Rows.  This arrives in plastic and when you take it out the latex smell is overwhelming.  The smell will seep into anything you have near it, so be forewarned.  I had to give it a couple of days to air out, and the scent faded so it did really help.  The hooks on it are strong, stronger then any hooks I have seen on a waist cincher.  It does run small and will be tight.  It will certainly train your waistline if you get the proper fit.  Mine is a little too small and I will have to shed some pounds before I will be able to use this, that and the smell makes it lose a star for me. I received this cincher as a promotional test product at a discounted testing price to use and review.  The stars I give are based off my own personal opinion and not any discount received.  This is my honest and unbiased opinion after receiving and using this cincher.

Awesome waist trainer and very well made! This is nice latex rubber and will sweat off those inches! This is well constructed!  This will get you the results that you want if you follow a diet and exercise routine! If you wear this while you exercise you wil sweat!! A lot!!  This will give some awesome  immediate results! I personally used another with it at the same time because I have a super long torso and the two made for a regular torso made for a regular torso this will be fine for you! This is had been an amazing trainer! I love it it is so well made! Full disclosure I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest review!! Honestly this is the best latex wait trainer I have put my hands on ever! I have had several and this one is the best!!! I hope that you found this helpful! Have a blessed day!!

To start off with, I read a lot of reviews on this waist trainer. Many women recommended going up in size. I measured and measured and measured again, just for good measure. (Ha ha.) I followed the recommendations of going up in size. Following the chart, I should have been able to fit in a size large easily. I purchased an extra large. Felt like it would take team effort just to get the extra large on but no way was I going to ask someone to help me squish all my extra baggage in. Finally after a lot of effort, I was able to get all the hooks done up. That was a work out in itself. But it was on! Not for very long though, it was very uncomfortable trying to sit down. If I could stand up all the time it might not have been as bad. About one week later I tried it on again. This time it was much easier to get on and it felt a lot better. Actually it felt kind of good and it did make me look slimmer everywhere except at the top in the back. It appeared to move my muffin top to my upper back. This was with a tighter tank top on. Maybe with a looser top, it wouldn't have been so noticeable.  Either I lost a little weight or it stretched out a bit or maybe it was easier to get on because I'd done it before and just had it figured out. This waist trainer is very well made. It has three rows of 10 hooks that would need to take a lot of abuse to get one of the hooks to pop out. They are put in very well. There is 2.25" between the first row of hooks and the third row. All of the seams are sewn very well. All in all this waist trainer is made with quality in mind. Even though I don't know how long it will take for me to wear it comfortably for more than an hour or so, I am glad I purchased it and I do like it. Maybe one day I will grow to love it. For now liking it is ok.
I received this waist trainer at a discounted price for my honest review. I take my reviews serious because people count on an unbiased opinion of a product. As a consumer myself, I look to these reviews to receive more information about a product I am considering purchasing and I know I want to read the honest opinions of others. This is a perfect example of how important honest reviews are. Had I not read that a lot of women recommended going up in size I probably would have followed the chart and purchased something that was way too small for me. Buying something sight unseen makes honest reviews even more important.
summary: Very well made, suggest going up a size from what chart says.

I truly love this waist trainer

I received this waist trainer a couple of days ago and have worn it for about 6 hours over two days. While it takes time to get results in your waist size, I did notice that it gave me excellent support and improves my posture. It is a little tighter than I expected, but it is a waist trainer after all. The length is good for me (I am 5'4" and I ordered the "short torso"), however, I wish the seller would have listed the length measurements for short vs. long so I wouldn't have had to guess. I am pleased with the quality and price of this waist trainer. My friend purchased one at the mall and we compared them. They appear to be EXACTLY the same materials, down to the trim (there are vertical pieces of black and gold lace/trim on the sides). The only difference was brand (different tag) and price. The waist trainers at our local mall sell for $80+. Overall, I am satisfied with this purchase and I can't wait to see if I get results from wearing it.
This product was provided at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review.

I am in love with this short torso waist trainer. My first impressions were that the rubber felt weird and smelled weird. The hooks appear to be very sturdy so at first use, it was somewhat difficult to put on. After the first two wears, it was a lot easier to wear. Out of all the waist trainers I've tried, I like these the best because it did give me the hourglass waist shape and made my tummy look really flat. The best part?!?! It is VERY comfortable. The first wear, I had it on for almost 3 hours!!! As you wear it more, the rubber smell lessens and is more tolerable it's not a big deal. Other concern would be that if you wear something tight, the hooks are kind of visible so just be aware of that. Other than that, I really loved the product and wear it often!! As a disclaimer, I must state that I received this short torso latex sports waist trainer at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I am "short waisted" so I was excited to see a product that was aimed at people like myself. It's a pretty good product, but there are a few flaws that make it interesting to use.
Pros:
- looks exactly like the picture
- arrived nicely packaged and earlier than expected
- it's very sturdy and feels like it will do it's intended job very well
- it's a great length and I don't have anything hanging way down my sides looking silly.

Cons:
 - It smells a little bit funky. It aired out ok, but it took a couple days.
 - The size is off a little bit. It runs about a size smaller than expected.
 - It's hard to get on. The hooks are embedded in the rubber which makes them hard to do up. On the plus side, there is no way this thing is going to pop open on accident. ;)

I was lucky enough to receive this waist trainer at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion. Honestly, I think that the length is awesome and that the construction is great. The smell was a little bit off putting at first, but it faded. The sizing is a bit of a pain but not a deal breaker. I like it and I'll probably use it fairly often, I just wish it was a bit easier to get into. :)
summary: Nice quality product with a few minor flaws.

reviewText: The waist trainer came just as pictured/ described by seller. Shipping was on time & came packaged well. I am very happy with my overall purchase! 10/10! *Disclaimer: I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review. I was offered no incentive for anything other than that. The discount has not influenced or impacted my judgement of this product. I take this seriously and include my own opinion and experience with each product. The material is will made, is comfortable holding my back.

This garment fits very small so go for a size larger than you normally would otherwise it will be too uncomfortable to wear. I ordered an extra large but would never think of buying XL in clothing. It did take me a while to work out which side to wear next to my body.
It has the appearance and feel of a high quality corset. It does have a slight latex smell but nothing too overpowering.
It reminds me of a back brace I had to wear when I had back problems but not as solid and as such is excellent as a subtle back support garment. It has quite a bit of flexibility, the ribs aren't too solid and the whole thing feels a little like a wet suit.
I live in Florida and feel that this may be too hot to wear in the Summer but on the plus side it may help me lose a few extra inches in sweat while working out.

Crocs, love to hate them...they serve a purpose. I wear them around the house. They're comfortable and last a long time. They are also inexpensive particularly when you consider their lifespan. Every little thing gets stuck in the tiny crevices on the soles and it pretty hard to clean out. One wearing, stepped in something gross, and for the last month they have been sitting outside abandoned. Tried hosing them off, scraping them off, scrubbing them off...I realize they are no slip for indoor use, kitchens, but thought they might work well for my around the house use. I imagine they eventually will. I'll just better watch where I step.

reviewText: material is too thin and the size fits way too small

My sister and I are planning top go backpacking in Europe so I need a travel pillow that wouldn't take up much room in my backpack but I didn't want one of those plastic ones. I found this one and I think it's the perfect solution. I haven't traveled with it yet, but I have blown it up. I was thrown off by the big whole for the air but it really just took 2-3 blows and it was full. When you want to deflate it you open the cap and push the flap down & it's instantly flat. It also comes with an eye mask and ear plugs which, for me, makes a complete travel kit!! It also comes in a small bag that fits all of it, so I can easily attach it to my backpack, suitcase or purse. As the picture shows it has a pocket for your phone, but doubles as a whole for when you fold the pillow up. The outside cover is REALLY soft. I'm really looking forward to when i travel so I can use it! I honestly think this is the perfect solution to having to carry around any other typical travel pillow. I've always thought they were kind of a nuisance to have to worry about or keep up with. If you like to travel, but hate to carry around a travel pillow, this pillow is the solution!!
I received this item at a discount or for free in exchange for my honest opinion.
summary: Perfect solution for long flights without the hassle of typical travel pillows

reviewText:
I just received my braclet today. It arrived ahead of time. At first I thought it looked exactly as pictured but then I noticed that the green gem is slightly smaller than the others but I suppose that's nit picking. Overall super pleased and exactly what I expected! Just wish I knew specifically what the gems are. But I asked. I'll update if they say.

Update! They said its Red Crystal (root chakra), Carnelian(sacral chakra),Topaz(navel chakra), Green Aventurine(heart chakra), Lapis Lazuli (throat chakra), Amethyst (third-eye chakra), White Crystal (crown chakra). I wasn't sure what red crystal and white crystal was so I looked it up and I think they might mean red quartz and white quartz. Anyhow super pleased with the healing properties of all the stones and with the stones themselves. Also I've had the bracelet a while now and it's durable. I've slept with it on its made sturdy, good quality.
summary: Super pleased and exactly what I expected

Celebrate the new year with a new look. This Blooming Jelly Women's Long Sleeve Off the Shoulder Tops Basic Tee Shirt is a sexy find. I normally do not buy clothes on the internet because I have a weird shape and am always concerned about fit. I am 5 foot tall and weigh about 130 pounds...a little chunky. I normally buy a medium top. I was advised before I ordered that clothes from this company run small, so I ordered an extra large. It is a little big, so if I had it to do over again I would get a large. The material does stretch. The sleeves are just the right length. The material is very soft and drapes well. The red color is rich and has an orange undertone. The seams are well finished so they will not unravel. With the give in the fabric the style will hide a myriad of figure flaws. The cut outs at the shoulder give the top some va va voom, so it is sexier than a t shirt, The fabric also has some subtle ribbing to add a little more flair. I purchased this top at a discounted rate in exchange for my fair and honest review.
summary: Perfect for a night on the town!!

My daughter loves this tank! it fits as expected, it is super comfortable, and a nice color. I like the feel of the fabric and seams - as does my daughter. She has a lot of sensory issues around clothing, and this style and brand of tank tops work really well for us! The fabric also washes up nicely, and even though there have been opportunities for stains if you use a pretreater and a decent detergent, they do not seem to stick to the fabric. I know a lot of people blame the soap, but some knits are more prone to stains.

The other thing I really like about this tank is that the seams under the armpits are really nice and not thick!

All in all this is a great tank that keeps my girl cool on the hottest of days!

When playing MGS, I never used this or knew what it was for.  After I beat the game (both main parts), I was left with nothing but all the extra side ops.  Thought I'd finally give this thing a try and when I did, I realized it's going to be the most effective thing for when I have children.  When my girlfriend and I get to that point and are ready to sacrifice our sanity, we know that our kids will end up being twice as bad as we were, since they'll have both our genes.  And that's where the chicken hat comes in.  My girlfriend once protested for cookies in a Vons supermarket, hiding in a pyramid of toilet paper to the point where they had to shut down the Vons for over two hours while trying to find her.  It seems likely that when we have kids, they'll try the same stuff, so when they do, I'm going to have this hat ready for them to wear.

reviewText:
***UPDATED Review***A few weeks after wearing this trainer I could feel it sticking me under the sides and front of my breast. It wasn't unbearable but uncomfortable. About 2 weeks later I had red scares under the sides of my breast. I applied Bio Oil and Ambi and kept wearing it because by now, a month after buying it I was losing inches off my waist and I could tell, so I started pulling it down further to avoid it being underneath my breast, meaning it was no longer covering my back bulges like before. Then one of the PLASTIC rods came out, I threw it away, but about 6 weeks later a metal rod came out that I kept, mind you you this is suppose to be a steel waist clincher, not plastic. What really turned me off is when after wearing it only 2 months one of the fasteners loosened, then another, and after 4 months off wearing it 2 fasteners came off and 3 were hanging on by a thread about to fall off.  I am not that big, I did purchase the extra large but as it became more and more loose I would move it from the first set of hooks to the next, which is the purpose and I was exercising and dieting so losing inches rapidly, therefore, after 4 months I had moved all the way to the 3rd row but isn't that reason most of us buy these waist trainers is to lose inches and if it's not we are waisting our money. This is a poorly made product. I ADVISE YOU DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY, try one of the others. End of 9/23/17 update, by the way, I haven't worn this item since June, I just ordered another brand and remembered to update my review for this one.***
I'm only giving this a 4 star instead of five because I've only had it for a week and not sure if it's suppose to or if it can realistically make you lose inches in your waist and stomach, but as far as clinching in your waist and stomach IT DOES THAT! It absolutely does that and it is not uncomfortable. I can sleep in it and wear it 8-10 hours at work (I don't do both because you feel like you need a relief if you wear it all day) and move around comfortably. However, it is not comfortable to sit while wearing it, I walk around all day at work so it's okay for me. You can definitely sit but you wouldn't be able to sit comfortably for 8 hours. It is not noticeable under your clothes. I have a short torso so it is perfect for me because it covers my back fat as well as comes down low enough to cover my lower stomach. I exercise but I would be comfortable exercising in this because the inside has a felt type lining which means you would have to wash it often and that may cause it to not last as long, meaning I don't know how well it would sustain constant washing. In my option this is only a waist clincher, that does just that, and not a product that would help you lose real inches. After taking it off, initially my stomach looks flatter but eventually it returns to it's true shape and size.
summary: UPDATED REVIEW after 4 months***Works as a waist clincher...not for weight loss

This is a beautiful and very functional bag.  I purchased this bag in a cognac/whiskey color (I don't remember the actual name of the color) and it is a gorgeous neutral that goes with everything.  I was very tempted to get the Turkish Blue...and I still may; it looks stunning.
I love the luxe lining inside the bag, all the interior pockets, the satchel handles and the adjustable shoulder to cross-body strap.  The croco embossed leather adds beautiful texture without too much flash.  This bag is structured, which makes it a good work bag if you don't have a ton of things to carry.
I can carry a few files, pens and a resource manual for work; my personal essentials, two sets of keys, small cosmetic bag, phone, and ipad mini (or even a full size ipad) and a book to read on breaks.  This is a bag that is not quite "large" but is a "large medium" sized bag.  I'm definitely a small to smallish-medium size bag girl; I feel large bags are too cumbersome, heavy, and just plain don't flatter me.  This is different; it tapers at the top and isn't so wide at the bottom that it displaces the arm if carried over the shoulder.
I always remove key tags from all bags and I did with this one too; its a little to flashy for me and I like to detach anything that adds weight if it isn't necessary.
I'm very happy with this purchase and I think I will have it and love it for years to come.
summary: This is a beautiful and very functional bag

I really like the size of this mouse pad for my desk.

I ordered this mat since I was moving to a smaller desk and couldn't use my old gaming mat. I went on Amazon and saw that this mat was only 30 inches in length and thought that it would be perfect since I was down-sizing. However, that was not the case. When I opened up the package and put it on my desk, the mat looked a little longer than 30 inches so I measured it. Despite being advertised as 30 inches in length on Amazon, the mat I received was actually 35 inches in length. This is weird since another user complained that the mat they received was only 30 inches.

Since I couldn't use the mat, I had to return it. Buying this item seems like it is a waste of time since the manufacturer cannot get the mat to be measured the right length. I do not recommend this mouse pad whether you want a 30 inch or 35 inch because you might get the one that you don't want.

Aside from the sizing error, the mouse pad does look okay. The quality isn't the greatest and seems like it should only be priced at about $5-10 and not the full $16.

I'd give this product a 5 star review had it been the dimensions it advertised. I bought this SPECIFICALLY for the 35" width because that's what I needed for my keyboard drawer. The item that arrived was only 30" which basically renders this useless for my use.

The build quality of this mat is incredible though. I've bought Razor and Perixx and both were nice but this new mat is REALLY thick and the stitching is solid. I also like that it's a solid black without logos.

EDIT: The company contacted me and corrected the posting which now reports the correct sizing of 30". This particular company is nice to work with, they respond very timely and made it right by me. I would definitely work with this company again and if you're looking for a 30" wide mat this mat is a GREAT choice!

reviewText:
I LOVE this ring!! I'm pregnant and wanted something that looked similar to my wedding ring, and also would not turn my skin green or cause any allergic reactions... (I have issues with nickel in jewelry a lot). I looked for several days to see what I could find and came across this ring.

First of all, it's BEAUTIFUL! My mom couldn't even tell it wasn't real!

Second, it's made of stainless steel, so it's not turning my finger green or causing any allergic reactions on my finger, which is awesome!

My ONLY complaint (And it's really not a huge deal) is that the included wedding band sits higher than the diamonds that match on the main ring. It doesn't sit higher than the center stone or anything, just a little higher than the band of smaller diamonds on the main ring. This may not bug most people, but I'm kinda OCD and I like things to match... and this bugs me...

HOWEVER, the main ring is so beautiful, and it's thicker by itself, so I just don't wear the wedding band with it, and it's fine. No big deal. On days where I'm going to be cleaning all day, etc, I just throw on the wedding band by itself, so it still gets worn. Very pretty set and I'm so glad I purchased!!
Overall happy with the purchase.

I am so glad I found this hat online. I was looking for a nice Santa hat for the holidays, and spent a long time looking? I have a small head so finding hats that come in sizes is difficult. I thought I wanted a plush faux fur hat and found one that came in sizes that was lined so it wouldn't be itchy but, when it arrived it was too small and cheap looking. I then spent more time looking and found this one. It wasn't exactly what I was looking for, or thought I was but it turns out to be the best Santa hat I could've found, and it came in time for Christmas. It arrived sooner than expected and was a very nice looking hat. It is well made/high quality, and extremely comfortable to wear. I was nervous that it may not fit as my measurements fell in the medium category but, because of the ages they listed I decided on the large (which was 8-12yrs)  and was glad I did as it fit well. There is some give to the fabric so I think a medium still would've fit but, it might have been been a little snug. Most adults would probably fit in the large--I don't remember if they had an XL which would be good for someone with a larger than average head if they make one.
 Also because it is made out of a dense weave of cotton with a very soft fleece around the rim it is both warm, and yet breathable. I could wear it in the house all day Christmas without overheating, but found it to be very warm when going outside. I highly recommend this hat.

reviewText: Worked great! Stayed on for hours even though it was super humid.

--------See bottom of original review for update---------

Ladies, let me make life easier for you....just order the "D."  Seriously.  The curve of the cup is very, very mild and shallow, so it would fit even normal A-cup ladies.  This is not like Victoria's Secret sizing.  And band size has no bearing here.  So if you are a small-to-average build female, and you normally wear an A, B, or maybe a smallish C cup size, just do yourself a favor and order the "D."  If you are normally a full C or larger, it's going to be really tough to fit yourself in here.  I'm a full C, and I can tell you exactly why you'll run into problems:

a)  The cups are shallow, and you don't want to give yourself that double-boob look that happens with a cup that's too small.

b)  The cups are very, very close set, and that's not adjustable.  The separation is roughly 1 centimeter.  Most women I know have more than 1 centimeter separation on their ribcage, which means that this is going to give you a very unnatural, pressed-together look, which is not the same as the relaxed, full cleavage you might find with a Victoria's Secret push-up, for example.

c)  The connector is very flimsy.  It's essentially just a plastic popper snap fastener (two plastic rings that click together) and I've found that they unsnap with relatively little pressure.  Can you imagine having your bra unsnap in the center during a night out or formal event?  (....BOING!)  It would be inconvenient, at least.

On the positive side, it adheres fairly well, while shielding the nipple.  I read that the manufacturer mentioned this was a 5-time-use item, and that's probably the most wear you'll get out of it.  I've found that you can extend the life by a couple more wears of you "clean" it with a small dollop of hand sanitizer gel.  I know that sounds weird, but the gel has enough slip to spread easily, but controllably, and it mitigates a little bit of the body oil that degrades the performance.

I have the black lace version, and it's actually real lace, made out of netting, not just printed fabric, which is nice.

I like the concept, but the sizing is misleading for western world women, and the materials could be a little better.  I think a metal popper would have been better than the plastic one used, and the foam could have been a little more flexible, which is why I only give this a 3 star rating.

--Sale price accepted in exchange for a candid and objective review.--

--------Update Jun 2016:------------
Came back to upgrade my rating to 4 stars, based on the fact that the seller proactively reached out directly to try to understand each of my issues with the bra.  In the end, I had to trade up from the lace cup to the black solid bra with side wings.  The side wings go up higher and wider on the sides of your chest, so they lock things into place a little better.  The center clasp is an actual proper hinge clasp, so it takes away the fear of a popper coming undone.  The cups are also wider set, so the clasp sits closer to the top of the ribcage and doesn't create such an unnatural look.  This is a bra I'd feel comfortable wearing under a formal dress, rather than self-conscious.
summary: If you wear an A, B, or smallish C cup, just order the "D".

reviewText:
I am finishing up a full work-day of wearing this bra. I've never had a 'sticky bra' like this before, and wasn't sure what to expect. Here's what I experienced:

The pros:
It really does make me look like I have some cleavage. As a very flat-chested woman, that's a huge plus (and why I bought it to begin with).
No straps. No clasps. I can actually BUY a backless dress now or one of those cute 'cut-out' dresses!
Not nearly as uncomfortable as I expected it to be.
I have a feeling that peeling this off at the end of the day is going to be much more relieving than unclasping a bra at the end of the day.
It holds really well. I haven't been in an environment where I sweat a lot (others have said the adhesive doesn't hold when you sweat), but I've been carrying around boxes and stuff today and it's stayed fine.

The cons:
I was kind of hoping for more 'upwards' support with this bra, but because you have to position your boobs to make sure the inside nipple covers do what they're supposed to do (otherwise ouch!), it's more of a 'together' support instead of 'up' support. Which works out fine! It just would have been nice to have some 'up' support.
It's a little bit itchy. It took some getting used to, and for the most part the itch went away after a little while. But occasionally I do feel a little itchy along the edges.

For the price, this is great just to have as a bra that you can wear with a backless/strapless dress. Plus, it does give you a bit of a cleavage look, so go ahead and feel sexy! I really enjoy this product so far.
summary: Pretty good! Survived a work day!

summary: Not too shiny or flashy but they make a statement!

reviewText:
These cufflinks are awesome. I wear cufflinks and always looking for something new, unique and different but classy enough to wear while at work. These nice square stainless steel cufflinks are everything I am looking for. First, they are unique in the square style. I love the buffed metal look. Almost looks like square ice cube shaped black buffed boxes. They are very elegant and nice. The Cufflinks are made really nice and I've worn then a number of times. I wear them for work in a very nice blouse and I also wear these with casual shirts and a pair of jeans. I love that these cufflinks can be dressed up and down but no matter what, they look great and make the shirt look great as well. I love the color. The black, grey color goes well with all of my french cuff shirts so no matter what I wear, These cufflinks work with it. These cufflinks are easy to use. Just put in the cuff holes of the shirt and put the fasteners in place. The fasteners work very well and stay in place. The cufflinks have nice weight on them. They are not just cheap and light. I am happy with these cufflinks and will continue to wear them.

I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion. This review is based on my personal experience with this product. I have no relationship with the seller of this product.

Love these!!!  They are a little smaller than I expected but otherwise are exactly what I wanted.  My husband has a few shirts that have holes for cufflinks, but he didn't own any so we've been trying to find some very plain, classic ones to buy so he can actually wear those shirts to work.  These definitely do the trick.

They feel fairly heavy in my hand considering the size, which makes them feel much higher quality.  Shiny black metal and the toggle part flips back and forth effortlessly and clicks into position open and closed.  Very easy to use and get on and off the shirt.  I like the cube design a lot because it's more modern than circles but is still very classic and can go with anything.  Wouldn't change a thing, and my husband wants to get more shirts with cufflink holes now that he can actually wear them!

I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.
summary: My husband loves these, timeless and class with a modern twist

reviewText:
Hubby is totally ecstatic about these cufflinks! We love that they offer a new look than the typical gold or silver.  The gunmetal brass color is pretty sleek and looks modern and fashion forward.  We love the simplicity of the design because hubby had been turned off by most cufflinks with the jewels in the center that are all the same.  The fasteners on the cufflinks being the same color as the rest of the cufflink adds to the clean look of the pieces.  And, the fasteners function well and are sturdy.  They sit well whether the gap they are closing is tightly buttoned or loose.  And, the links don't slide through big and tall buttonholes, which we love.

Please note that I received this product at a discount in return for an unbiased review.  This unbiased review is my own honest opinion after trying this product.

reviewText:
** I received this product in exchange for my opinion of it **

Used to be, it was hard to find cufflinks. When you did, they were at the rare men's suit shop and they were priced according to how 'rare' they seemed to be to find. Now, they are everywhere. Needless to say, it is a good time for those men who like to adorn their french cuff shirts with a little extra 'jewelry'. Cufflinks exude class, style, and not overly conspicuous.

Possessing a good number of cuff links from all brands and all prices (no-name to luxury) I can tell you that roughly, they are all very similar. While the most expensive use real stones or a variation of a precious metal, you don't really need those. What you need is a none 'coloring' metal, good ends that won't bend, and a cuff link that won't lose its shine.

This pair has done that. Firstly, they are made of metal -- and are heavy to accompany this. They are solid and hard. The ends give some resistance when turning and that is a good thing. The end's 'weld' point is strong and I could not bend it when trying with most of my strength.

These are a normal size for cufflinks. The ends are subdued and subtle. They fit well with dress and casual attire.

Overall, though, these are as good as will get sub-200$. If you don't care about stones or precious metals, then you could not really make a cuff link any better.
summary: Heavy Cuff Links With an Artistic Outlay

The fabric is - a men's boxers material or a Walmart's knitted t-shirt (that holds up to a 1 wash only) NOT a classy dress fabric. Overall - is a VERY POOR imitation of a boutique dress .

I've tried quite a few of these waist cincers within the last year, and surprisingly this is the only one I've found that fits a longer torso. Most others a too short to cover the real problem areas, but this one extended from just under my breast area to my hips. I was also pretty impressed that it actually gave me a little bit of curves. I ordered my size according to the size chart and when it arrived I was able to get it hooked on the second set of hooks with no problem and comfortably. If you want to "grow" into this, I would suggest one size down. As you wear it, you are going to wear it in a bit and eventually be able to wear it at the smallest setting. It's a gradual process and you should start by wearing it for an hour or two per day and increase the length of wear as you go until you can get use to wearing it all day. It's supposed to be tight, but not so that you can't breathe or comfortably get through the day with it on.

The hooks seem a little on the cheap side. The reason I say that, is because as I was attempting to hook the trainer together, a few of the hooks bent fairly easily. I can bend them back, but too much of that is going to cause them to eventually wear and completely break off. This is the reason I gave it 4 stars. Otherwise, it's a great trainer!

reviewText:
I absolutely love love love these headbands, and I am very picky about my baby's clothes and accessories.  I always check to make sure that they are soft and not scratchy or don't have any pokey parts that stick out or are uncomfortable. I am especially extremely picky with hats and headbands that I purchase because so many are made with uncomfortable material, have scratchy stitching, uncomfortable tags, or are too tight especially near their soft spots. I was nervous about purchasing these headbands because I couldn't feel them but I am so glad I did! A headband that I will buy needs to be soft, not scratchy on her head, not too tight, and must not have any type of hard glue or anything else to hold it together that will leave a mark on her skin- especially because babies heads are so soft. These headbands are great! They are super soft fabric and fit very well, honestly these are probably the softest headbands I have seen. The material is a nice soft material and doesn't seem cheap, it seems like a good material that will hold up nicely and looks great! I love that there are so many different cute designs! We already have plenty of solid color headbands so the cute designs are a nice change up.  I am seriously so happy with this purchase!

The only flaw I've found is that these headbands say they go up to 3 years, but they fit my 7 month old wonderfully and don't seem to me like they will grow with her for that long.

reviewText: Avoid at all costs. I trusted a review that said it worked for them. Should have known better, when I  saw it would take 8 weeks to ship from China.

This is not Qi wireless charging, the Huawei Watch does not support Qi wireless charging in the first place so the whole idea is just stupid, and one glance at the screenshots is enough to tell this is obviously not using Qi charging but the same pins that the standard charger that comes with the watch does. There is also obviously nothing about this product that qualifies as a "cradle" or "dock" (much less "charging dock cradle charger" whatever that even means), but that's semantic, the Qi wireless charging is outright, concrete false advertising.

In other words, this is obviously a scam, and it amazes me that this listing managed to get approved in the first place

reviewText: Great quality for the price.  Soft leather inside and out. It is a rather LARGE bag, almost a small carry-on or day bag size.  The hardwares are acceptable but not glorious, they are in kinda of rose gold tone.  The stitchings are nice in bright terra cotta orange color.  The hardware and stitching do match.  The "wings" are in black suede.  The center buckle is just a tad tricky, it is much easier to close while I am holding the  bag than placing it on a  flat surface.
summary: Good price for a quality LARGE bag in classic design!

Sure, I could put it on and tie it, and the length hit right where I wanted it to, but after a second opinion from my boyfriend, I couldn't keep it. This decision was not an easy one. Sure, the fit was a little off, but the blue-gray complimented my fair, cool-toned complexion, the sleeves weren't too long, and the jersey fabric felt breathable enough to be a perfect staple in my summer work wardrobe. The price-point was good for my wallet too (comparable cardigans tend to run $50 or more!). Quite disappointed, but not the end of the world.

Immediately after dropping off my return at a UPS drop-box, I parked at a nearby fast-food restaurant, opened the Amazon app on my phone, and ordered the next size up (10/12). Two days later, I had my dream cardigan! Flawless fit. Figure flattering. Flowy, but not frumpy/oversized. Appropriate for the office or lounging around the house. And best of all, machine washable! I have washed it in my washing machine three times (with like colors, cold water, Tide liquid detergent, no fabric softener), laid flat to dry, and it is still as soft as the day I received it (not sure how it would hold up in the dryer but I'm not going to take any chances). I want -- no, I NEED one in every color!

reviewText: How pretty! This is a stripe for people who don't normally like stripes. Very appealing colors - very slenderizing vertical stripes. But, if you order this be prepared to get a very sheer dress which is super, super long. Size L usually fits me well. This dress was way too small. However, with the recent loss of 35 lbs, it is realistic to think that my diet may help me fit into this dress eventually. This darn dress is just too pretty to send back! But, I'm not made of money, and had to consider whether I was being foolish, keeping something that I can't wear. No matter how much I (really, really) liked it, there had to be something more sensible than just WISHING for it to work out. So,  I weighed another pro and another con. Con: It would require a new hem. Do I like it enough to spend $$ to have that done? (Not usually, but in this case, yes.) Would a new hem have the same light, fluttering look that the original does? (Some risk.) Pro: The 20 pearly pink buttons down the front are beautiful, and, by themselves, would cost about as much to buy as the cost of this dress. If all else fails, using these buttons to replace the simple white ones on my current favorite dress (also with a long button down front) would make it look even prettier ... and more expensive. In the end, the buttons helped decide it for me.
summary: Beautiful Buttons, Delicate Striped Print ... and, oh, so .... SMALL!

I like the color. It is kind of a midnight blue, not the navy-black that it looks on my screen, but it is pretty and the style is cute. My only problem with it is it does run really small. I originally ordered my usual Large and could not even come close to buttoning the top (as a smock, the waist and hips were quite roomy). I had checked reviews for another similar dress from the same company and should have heeded the ones (multiple) that said it ran small and 'this is not made for girls with boobs'. I have those and, while they are not huge by any means, have run into that situation. However, it was also too narrow in the shoulders, which is very unusual for my pear-shaped body, meaning it was just generally too small.

So, I returned that one -- with no difficulty -- and ordered a 2X, which fits fine. It is obviously made on a different scale than standard US sizes. Just be aware of that when ordering, check the bust measurements in the size chart, and maybe go up an extra size if you are small-busted and have broad shoulders. Lastly, keep in mind that it is tunic length; the model pictured is probably not ridiculously tall. At 5' 6" even a 2X hits me well above the knee.
summary: Nice color and style, but runs small.

It is not often that I run into a company that cares enough to try to make things right for their customers, yet this seller contacted me apologized for the problem and offered to do whatever was necessary to make me feel better about dealing with them.

I love scarves, and have a bunch of them...at least forty...and they all get worn, some more than others. I imagine that this one will be worn often enough. It isn't my favorite, but it is nice looking and the design will make a nice accent to several outfits.
This scarf is pretty nice, with fairly regular and straight hemming and not much puckering, which can be a problem with light weight fabrics.
I got the animal print, and it says on the tag that it is 100% polyester. It does feel like a poly but with somewhat more body than most poly scarves.
I plan to wash it by hand and hang it up to dry. I believe it could also be washed in a garment bag on the delicate cycle in the washing machine. Being polyester, it is very unlikely to fade, but I would err on the side of caution and wash it in cool water, with similar colors.
The colors of the scarf are browns and black, deep, dark colors.
It is a rectangular shape and long enough to be double wrapped if you like, or any of a dozen or more ways that you can find online or in books with scarf tying suggestions.
I have tried it on with several tops and it looks best with ivory, browns, and black, but also orange, brick, and golden yellow.
I like it. I think it will help make some of my outfits look special.

reviewText:
I was told to stop carrying a heavy bag over my shoulder by my doctor and purchased this bag/backpack after an exhaustive search.

Here are the positives
- I LOVE the look of this bag. The leather is beautiful, the zippers sturdy, and the construction well done.
- Comparatively good price.
- GREAT for traveling on public transportation ... plane, train, bus, or walking around a city.
- Easy to put on and off.

Negatives
- This is NOT a cross body bag and I can't believe anyone but a tiny person could do so. I'm 5'4" and of average build and if I attempt to wear this as a cross body bag it hits me at an odd angle in my neck. This GREATLY disappointed me but as I needed the bag fairly immediately I didn't return it.
- I really wanted to love this bag enough to use it daily as it fits everything I need and more, but I just don't. I'm glad I have it as a travel bag, but it's not my holy grail.

I purchased this backpack to use for shopping. It arrived when promised and was packaged beautifully; all of the metal parts were wrapped with tissue and taped as was the entire bag. It was also placed inside a recycled bag and shipped in a sturdy box. The bag looks and feels well-made, and has a lovely sheen.  Pockets inside and out are roomy and are a gorgeous color.  The price was good compared to other bags like this and I would recommend a friend.

I've been looking for a medium size leather backpack for a long time. I was excited to find this one because of the unique feature with the straps (backpack straps pull out to become shoulder bag). I've never seen this before and really like it!

I received the bag yesterday and here are my first impressions. Overall, love the look of the bag! The description says leather, and in the reviews, I saw some people didn't think it was leather. If it's fake leather than it looks really good. It does not have that beautiful leather smell, but it also doesn't have the awful chemical smell that a lot of fake leather has. I actually think it is leather. I ran my fingernail along a spot on the bottom of the bag and it did not scratch.

The straps are great! I love the handle strap - makes it easy to hold the bag when you want to get something out of a pocket or to quickly pick up the bag. The backpack straps are easy to adjust for length, and it's easy to put the bag on and off. I don't really like the look of the bag as a shoulder bag because it looks so much like a backpack, but I like the option.

The pockets are a bit tighter than I was expecting, but it's probably due to the bag being so slender. The front pocket can hold only small items or very slender items. I have a tube of chapstick and lipstick in there. In the large zippered pocket, I can fit my A5 planner (which was the whole reason I wanted a backpack), slender (but full size) wallet, my iPhone, sunglasses case, small hairbrush, and small makeup bag. My iPhone did not fit in the smaller inside pocket which I assumed was for a cell phone, but it fit in the larger inside pocket. Everything fits in the main pocket but it is very tight! When I'm not going to work, I'll probably end up taking my planner out so there is more room in the main pocket. I have a toddler in diapers, and I could easily fit his changing pad with a small package of wipes and a few diapers in the bag if I took my planner out. I don't see myself using the back zippered pocket very much. The pocket is deep and wide, but the zipper opening isn't as big as the pocket so it's hard to get my hand in. A nice option for a small wallet while traveling, I guess.

Overall, I love the look and functionality of the bag! I wish there was a little more room in the pockets, but I love the slender look of the bag and I wouldn't want to give up that look. I love being hands-free! I've been carrying a crossbody bag for years, but they tend to swing to the front when you bend over, which is really annoying. A backpack does not do that.
summary: Great backpack with lots of functionality! I recommend this bag!

reviewText: I've been using this backpack for 2 months now. I bought it for travel but ended up using it everyday. Quality is great. The inside lining is nice. My surface pro fits in it perfectly plus, I like that it has a zipped compartment in the middle - great for passport/documents storage. The back pocket is also perfect for money/phone storage, especially when you're traveling. It is a great backpack for me, it has everything that I need for everyday use or travel. After 2 months of daily use, it still looks shiny and new. I'm happy with my purchase and I am buying another backpack in wine color.
