I really like the design on this sweatshirt. As you can see in my short video, it is boldly striped but they are at an angle that lines up well with the sleeves when your arms are down. The drawstrings on the hood are also intentionally off-centered. It's a cool looking effect. The sweatshirt itself is fairly thick and I like the fact that the sleeves are long enough to cover part of my hand as well. Too many times I get tops that don't cover my arms all the way. I also like the coverage that the hood provides. When on, it completely covers my head and then some. Great for keeping warm! The elastic bands on the sleeves and bottom help it to stay in place without being too tight. It's important to mention that this is definitely a ladies cut sweatshirt. It tapers in the middle. I usually wear a size medium top but I like my sweatshirts big and bulky. I ordered an XL and although it fits well, it isn't as large as I had expected. You can see how it fits in the screenshots at the end of the video. Just keep that in mind when deciding what size to purchase. This sweatshirt provides great coverage and the pattern is definitely unique!. I received this item for free in exchange for my honest review.

Let me start by saying I was blown away with the customer service that was provided to me! I was one of 5 bridesmaids that ordered from  Milano Bride. We all ordered separately at different times. Although we all received our dress in a fairly timely manner some did take longer to arrive than others. After placing my order I received an email requesting my measurements and preference on a zip back or corset back. I sent in my measurements and asked for the corset back. One of the other girls did not send in her measurements and got her dress in standard sizing. My dress fit beautifully while the other bridesmaid needed some additional altering. Also since we all ordered separately there was some confusion where one of the dresses arrived with a zip back instead of corset. That particular bridesmaid contacted the company and they exchanged the dress with no major issue that I heard of. As for the quality of the dress I was highly impressed! I'll be honest we were leary about ordering our dresses online but working on a tight budget it was our best option. Don't be confused these ARE custom made dresses. The construction of the dress was very good. It even came with some extra  built in support which was nice. Since we had 5 different body types I was surprised that we all looked nice in the dress but we did. The color for all dresses were a good match as I know they were not all cut from the same bolt of fabric As for the fabric itself, it was of high quality. Not cheap feeling or costumey.  Since the dresses arrive in a bag we took them in to have them professionally pressed and on weddings day we all looking beautiful!

I tried on 28 different pairs of swim leggings from Amazon, and this was one of them.

These are more relaxed fitting than the many other pair of swim leggings I tried on. They do not cling to the skin when dry. Ranking of Swim Legging Brands, from Best to Worst
1. Private Island
2. Coolibar
3. Undercover Waterwear
4. CocoShip
5. Sun Protection Swimsuits
6. EcoSting
7. Bohn

reviewText: This Myobe Sweater Dress is very pretty. However, I will say that it's more of a long sweater than a dress. The only way I see this working on someone as a dress is if you are a shorter person. Otherwise, it won't cover your butt (unless you like it hanging out and showing LOL.) My daughter is 5' 9" tall and this was not long enough to be a dress by any means. I ordered her an XL and she is a size 12-14 and it fit her for a beautiful sweater. It was not tight around her chest or arms and fit nicely. Ordered the white which is a very bright white. The listing makes the white (as listed) look cream, which it is not. The knit pattern is very pretty and well done. There were no flaws or loose stitches or anything like that. The knit and sweater is a thinner material so I would recommend also wearing a lighter top or a camisole under it. This is made very well. Overall, a very nice sweater "dress" that I would recommend for a sweater. I received this product with a promotional discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. No compensation for a positive review was provided. All of my reviews are based 100% off of my experience with the product and I never guarantee a positive review.
summary: Very Pretty But Not Long Enough For A Dress!

reviewText: I was initially skeptic of the fit as I ordered the item before I read the reviews. I was expecting a fit to be too small. The dress actually fit perfectly. It is, however, thin/see through (I ordered the white version), so one would need something to wear under. I like it!

This dress is darling and fit exactly as it should, but when I received it, there were some large openings in the knit. I had to wear it  because I didn't have time to send it back. That was disappointing, but it was a cute dress.

This is a super cute knitted dress that is appropriate for fall, winter or early spring! This dress is on the light side, so I would recommend wearing a cami or slip underneath it. Depending on what color you purchase, that can also prevent someone being able to see through it, too. This looks super cute with a pair of flat or high heeled boots. You can pretty much match any color with it. I opted for the white knitted dress and it looks cute with brown, black, or red boots! This is easily paired with any type of accessory. This dress is plain enough that any accessory will not make this dress look over done! This has a very simple pattern and you can "dress" this dress up or down depending on your mood or the occasion. The fit was good overall. I would recommend referring to the sizing chart if you are not sure about an appropriate size.

I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest & unbiased opinion.
summary: This is a super cute knitted dress that is appropriate for fall

reviewText:
This is a really cute top. I chose the white, and it is a nice bright white. It's not really a sweater...but a light top. I had to wear a tank top underneath so it wasn't see-through. However, it is very comfortable. I am 5'5" and 122 lbs, and I ordered a small. It fit me pretty well, but I have longer arms, so it would have been nice if the sleeves were about an inch longer. Regardless, it is the perfect kind of top to wear with leggings! It's long enough to cover your butt, but not really dress length. It looked cute with leggings, boots, and a scarf. It was a perfect weight for working in the office in the winter. I wasn't cold or hot and was perfectly comfortable.

reviewText:
The most important thing you need to know about this is that it's more of a long shirt than a dress. Everything fits well, I ordered a size up, but it's way too short for a dress. As others have stated it would work great with a nice pair of jeans or leggings and boots.
The fabric is so very soft. It's extremely comfortable and light weight. I would definitely recommend wearing a tank top under it because it's pretty see-through, especially if you're busty. Because of how light weight it is I wouldn't recommend this for winter wear. Maybe if you have a jacket that pairs well and very thick jeans. But it's pretty thin.
The pattern and color are lovely, true to the photos. I ordered brown, I just think white gets too dirty quickly, and it looked nice. As weird as it is, I think it is a little odd with olive skin tones. I'm sure it looks great once you have the whole outfit together but when I first tried it on it brought out the warmer, yellow tones in my skin. And that's not something I personally like about myself with this "dress."

Minus how I feel about the color and the fact that it's called a dress while being way too short, I think it's a lovely longer shirt. I think it looks great with just about anything from pants or leggings, to belts, to long necklaces. It's definitely a versatile piece!

I received this item in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. These opinions are mine and mine alone.
summary: As others have stated it would work great with a nice pair of jeans or leggings and ...

reviewText: This Myobe women's crewneck knitted sweater is really cute, but I was a bit disappointed with the sizing.  I normally wear an XL, as I like my shirts comfy but not hanging off of me.  Although it is incredibly comfortable, the material sucks to your body and is a bit small.  The XL states that it fits a US size 12-14, but it's more like a 10-12 -- so it's off by a size or so.  It's very lightweight and wouldn't keep you very warm in the really cold winter weather, but perfect for our Arizona winters.  It's actually quite thin, so you'll probably want to wear a t-shirt or tank top underneath it - because you can sort of see through it.  This is pretty stretchy and has a tiny bit of sheen when I took a picture with a flash, but when seen with your eye, it's a solid brown color with no sheen at all.  I do love the A-line flare at the bottom of it and you could totally dress this up or wear it with a pair of jeans!  There was a snag on the bottom front of my shirt and I'm afraid that if I snip it with a pair of scissors, it will start a horrible unraveling effect that would ruin it completely.  Washing this may be a bit tricky.  There isn't a tag inside mine that states what it's made of or how to wash/dry it - but my guess is that it would have to be hand washed.  It just seems too delicate to throw in with other clothes, but MIGHT work on a gentle washing cycle.  I've gotta say, it's a lot cuter on the model in the picture listing, probably because she's a tiny lady - but it gives me inspiration to lose more baby weight so it fits better.  Overall, it's ok - but doubt I'll wear it a ton just because it was sized wrong and I'm not particularly keen on hand washing clothing items.  I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest review.
summary: Comfy & cute, but sizing is not accurate.

reviewText:
This Myobe women's crewneck knitted a-line sweater dress is cute, there is no question on that. However, to call it a sweater is a bit of a stretch. That does not mean I don't like this dress, I do in fact. It says on the listing that it is thin, but it is not quite as thin as I was expecting when it arrived.
I usually wear a size 4, but with these types of items I usually size up. I got the medium and I am glad I did. I can see why some people would be having issues with being able to see through it. It is a pretty stretchy fabric so it could easily fit, but and bit of tension on the fabric would probably make it see-thru. The fabric is some sort of polyester blend, and the parts that look like cable knit is a kind of clever rouching meant to look like knit.
I will happily wear this all winter with leggings and boots, probably into spring as well. It is not the best sweater dress I have ever owned, but it isn't bad. Generally I like it.
I did receive this item at a discount for my HONEST review.
summary: Not really a sweater, but still cute

reviewText: I was very disappointed in this top.  There is no support at all.  I ordered the 40E/38F/36G and I can't imagine it would fit more than a 36 D.  The print is very cute but the top is not sufficient.

Overall, the outfit fits well except for in the bust area (I'm a B/C cup depending on the fit of a bra and the bust area is quite large). The downside to this is that unless you're a D cup, you'll probably need to have this altered which, isn't an easy fix due to the seam lines being on the center of each bust. I was able to have the tailor make the changes but, the cost of that was more than the actual outfit itself. The other aspect that would make this better, would be if the fabric had a little bit of nylon in it. Being 100% Polyester, it's nearly impossible to keep wrinkles from appearing. Living in a city, it's possible to wear it out somewhere that I can walk to and stand at the event. But if I had to sit in an Uber or drive somewhere- it would be really wrinkled by the time I arrived.

reviewText: Good product! I didn't give it 5 starts because of the texture of the outside, is more like plastic.

I have this bag in black, and have used it on two international trips, plus several domestic vacations.  I like that it looks like a "regular" bag and doesn't scream "tourist."  But it also gives that extra feeling of security, with the cut-proof strap, and various locks and RFID protection.  It holds a lot; easily holds my iPad mini inside or in the external sleeve (worn next to the body).  My favorite aspect is that it is so lightweight, and the strap is nicely padded, so even fully loaded it is comfortable to wear cross-body all day.  The two open front pockets are great for easy access to things like sunglasses or even a water bottle.  I tend to keep my phone in the front open pockets, because even though they are not secured, they are deep enough to keep the phone safe.  Inside are several organizational pockets, and an additional zip pocket.

reviewText: Love it!

First things first this is not a soft robe. I mean that it is not one of those that you touch at the store and think wow this is so soft I would love to curl up in this in my pajamas. That's okay with me because I did not buy it to be a robe that was soft with my pajamas. I bought it as a bathing suit cover up and it works great for that purpose. I think the style is smart-looking and while I wished it came in non plus sizes I still and glad I bought it. I had a white one for two years but because I use self tanner I found it got stained very quickly if I got hot and perspired. The black one is just like the white one but I won't have to worry about staining it. I find the pockets to be handy and believe it or not do use the hood when I am cold on my way back from the beach. If you, like me, have combed Amazon and seeing the array of bathing suit cover-ups you will see that this particular one stands out as being modest, clean and neat looking. My bathing suits all have a skirt to them and so many of the cover-ups are barely cover up and made to accentuate bikinis. Those would look ridiculous over my bathing suit but this one looks very stylish and smart.

I normally wear a size 10 or 12 in ladies clothes, but I bought the smallest size they had in Plus Sizes because I do not mind my cover up being a little bit larger and they do not offer smaller sizes.
summary: A very well made and attractive cover up

reviewText:
Was mislead by this product, thought it was
'Savile Row Mens Classic Dress Belt 100% Leather 35 MM Black Size 42', has near identical picture and is in the color/style options menu below the product, but it is infact a wholly different product, using 'Genuine Leather' instead of the patent leather that brought me to the product.  Looking at the box it came in, it says 'patent leather' but the belt itself does not.

Before you think I'm insane, use the belt for 6mos-1year and see what shape it is in.
Great quality, affordable, and looks sharp. I wear this with my favorite blue suit.

EDIT:
I purchased this belt, and after a few months the tooth of the belt buckle had broken. I was disappointed as this was one of the first belts I've owned where the leather doesn't crack or peel. However upon contacting the seller, they offered an immediate replacement. Great customer service, and the belt itself is very nice - assuming the tooth doesn't come off again. It was suggested to me that I may have received a faulty product. Either way, good service, and the belt looks and feels nice
summary: Looks nice, good customer service after issue

This hat came in an ENTIRE MONTH EARLY! For that, I'm grateful. I got the opportunity to review this item at fifty percent off the listed price on Amazon. So for me, that was about five or size dollars. Even with the half off price, I am so, so disappointed. The description says "imitated wool". Since I am unfamiliar with that texture, I guess imitated wool means "similar to cardboard." This hat literally feels like it came from a costume shop. It was also folded in half when it came in. So there are creases and folds through out the hat that I can not manipulate back in to its original (or what I think the original) shape (should be). The ears are about the only thing that I like about the hat. There are adjustable strings on the inside of the hat, but that doesn't matter because the smaller you get the hat, I'm sure an infant would be able to use it. This hat, without the adjustments, fits a four year old. My four year old. If the hat didn't come in folded, especially because of the material it is made out of, and it actually fit my head. I wouldn't rate so harshly, but because it looks and feels like it came out of Party City, this hat did not work out for me. There was no product guarantee with the product itself when it was delivered to me, or in the product description, so please keep that in mind as well. Having worked on the roads at night, I discovered that a pair of amber-tinted glasses can really help with contrast, making objects "stand out" better.  These polarized day/night glasses from Jaky have lenses that transition from gray tint at the top, to yellow at the bottom; giving you a great solution for sunset and late evening driving.

When the sun is low on the horizon, the tinted portion of the lens does a good job of reducing glare, while the lower amber portion brightens objects on the road, and increases contrast.  Although this dual-purpose lens does take a little getting used to, they become second-nature (and a welcome benefit) in no time.  I have found that the day/night lens is best suited for dawn or dusk usage.

These stylish glasses are constructed well, and I haven't had any issues with loose lenses or screws, through months of usage.

This dress is amazing! The hip area is a little large, but nothing that I couldn't deal with. The dress is beautiful. In the process of putting it on, I did lose a few beads but you can't tell at all. All of my friends love this dress and I can't wait to wear it to the military ball. My only concern is that if by some miracle I do lose *too* much weight in the next month, (what a problem to have) then I may not be able to get the corset tight enough to keep the dress on! The rep (Candy) was amazing to work with. She checked the measurements she felt were wrong (they were) and she was quite reassuring. I ordered my dress at the beginning of March, and the dress arrived in exactly 20 days, was delivered by DHL and I was able to specify how, when, and where it was delivered on that day. It was not deterred at all by needing to sign a slip and have it redelivered. The next time I need a dress for a Ball, I will gladly shop through Dressystar again. I also ordered the matching shawl which should be showing up soon, but I have no concerns that it will match the dress! I can't wait to wear this!
summary: I LOVE this dress! It's AMAZING and worth every PENNY!

reviewText: Very nice small bag.  I do understand some of the reviewers concerns about the size of the bag....but when you look at the picture for this particular bag and see the cording, I was assuming the size that it would be.  It is the perfect size for jewelry or for potpourri.  Nice sewing quality, and the embroidery is much nicer than I anticipated.  I did not purchase this item via amazon but through another site.

The title of this item is Yangtze Women's Beautiful Embroidered Silk Travel Bag for Lingerie & Shoes.  This is not a travel bag for lingerie & shoes. Well, you can fold a pair of thin underwear and fit it in the bag but that is not true to its title.  If you are truly looking for a travel bag for lingerie or a pair of shoes I would not recommend this item.  The bag is very small but you could use it for jewelry.  I didn't notice the size of the bag when I ordered but was expecting something bigger based on the title.  The bag is a nice burgundy color and is lined with gold embroidery and gold drawstrings.  Unfortunately the bag is not very good quality.  If you take a look at the picture you may be able to see that within the gold embroidery it looks almost like there are holes and you can see the black inside lining.  Prime is not offered with this product and it took a couple weeks to arrive.  The item is shipped from China.  I would not recommend this product based on the quality and because it is not true to name and description.  I received this product for a discount in exchange for a fair and honest review.  Note: the picture makes the back look red but it is just the lighting.
summary: Description Does Not Match the Product

reviewText: Fits good.  Nice quality.

I ordered one of these and my wife was super jealous of it so I ordered her one. Problem solved in this one. Quality is as good if not better than the others I purchased, the design is neat. She put it on her head and it fit well. She has a big head so if it fits her head it should fit anybody's. No worries, she is totally aware that she has a big head and picks on me for having a small one. It fits my small one well too, by the way. The spandex-type material stretches well. Not my style, but it looks fantastic on her. Can't wait to use these on a hike in the mountains to keep our faces warm. We're avid outdoors people and these will make a perfect addition for cold weather hiking and fishing. Thinking of buying some more for stocking stuffers during the holiday season for my family of fishermen.

The stitching is good. It is very durable. I stretched it and tugged on it to test it out. Works very well. As I mentioned before, it is a sort of spandex material that is not to thick, but keeps you pretty warm as it fits tightly. I wore mine under my hood and it was fantastic. Could be used any time you want to keep the sun off of your head, neck, and face. I have used mine to mow the lawn before. My wife can wear it as a headband on runs. They wash easily. No super special wash instructions.

reviewText:
I really like this swimsuit. The cut, color, and pattern are all very flattering. I especially love the high waist, which is really a high waist that hits right at my natural waistline, unlike some other swimsuits. The ruching on the bottoms is a nice feature, as it helps hide belly fat and is cute. The bottoms actually fit me kind of like boyshorts in the legs more than a bikini cut, which I like. The top is padded, though not underwire, so keep that in mind if you need lots of support. The fabric seems like quality stuff and I can't get over how cute the floral pattern is, especially for this style of swimsuit. I do think that this suit runs slightly small, as I generally wear a 4-6, and according to the size chart that equates to a Medium, so that's what I ordered. However, the bottoms are slightly tight, which is alright because it helps to shape, but it is a little uncomfortable around the legs and the waist kind of popped when I first put it on. At least I don't have to worry about the bottoms coming off in the ocean waves! On the other hand, the cups in the top are a little large, or at least aren't great push-up cups, but it is really comfortable. I'm excited to use this swimsuit all summer.
I purchased this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review; I hope it helps with your purchase!

reviewText:
After reading all the other reviews, I went with an XXL - not great for my vanity, but accurate.  I wear a 10/12 and I'm a 34DD.  The cups on the bra top are a little too large, but the bottoms are perfect.

As many others have said, this retro cut is really flattering for those of us with mom bodies.  I especially love the coverage the bottoms provide - it 'scoops up' my bum and makes everything look better back there.

My one nitpick is that I wish, wish, wish the bottoms were fully lined!  They are only lined in the front, and I fear the backside is going to wear quickly and/or show the dreaded bum crack when the fabric is wet.

I received this suit at a discount in exchange for an honest review.  I know I discount these kinds of reviews, but I pinkie promise my thoughts and opinions are my own.

I love all things retro so an adorable high waist bikini is a must!
I was a little worried the high waist with ruching and bold flowers would look too "Grandma-ish" and possibly make me look bigger than what I actually am but it's incredibly flattering!
Be sure to check the sizing chart they provide because it does run small. I purchased a XXL (US 10-12) and I normally wear a medium/large in both tops and bottoms.
Though it doesn't take away from my rating, I do wish the top had removable straps so you could chose how you want it to be held up. I find the halter style semi-supportive but would be much happier with actual straps.

I usually wear a size 8 bottom and I am a 34 D top so I ordered the XXL per the previous orders and the bottoms fit great but the cups on the top are a tad big. Also it arrived with some stitching off on the top which was disappointing but I am going to give it a quick stitch to fix it. Overall I am happy with my purchase of this bikini.

I ordered the Saslax Retro 50's Floral Halter High Waist Bikini in blue with pink flowers.  It arrived on time and when I opened the package I was pleased to see the vibrant colors.  The colors look even nicer than how they appear online!  The bikini came in an acrylic/plastic usable bag that is perfect for putting the wet bikini in so other items in your bag don't get wet or damp.  The fit was perfect for me.  I'm 51 years old so I didn't want anything revealing and the high waist gives me plenty of coverage.  This is a bikini I an wear at the beach or in my backyard pool without feeling I need to cover up.  Even my adult children approved this suit!

I have generally bought the same VS style over and over again for the past several years -- the basic two piece swimsuit in varying shades of black or neutral colors. However, I have been seeing this retro style all over the place (apparently it's in style again?) and decided to take the plunge. Instead of black, I purchased the blue floral print and absolutely love it. I am rather pale, but the colors accent my skin perfectly. I went off the sizing chart, but unfortunately the bottom is a little too tiny for me; however, I think it will work with a few more cardio sessions. I'm going to a wedding in Mexico over Christmas, and this will definitely be my go-to swimsuit for the occasion! While I did receive this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review, I would recommend this swimsuit to anyone looking for a change from the same generic style that has been produced the past several years.

I don't expect myself to look like a super model wearing this swimsuit, but overall I think the design of swimsuit enhance my body to look curvy. reviewText: A little big. Minor alterations needed. I will be removing padding. All in all, I Love the swimsuit.

I normally wear a size 14, but bathing suits can be iffy with how they run, so I purchased the 14-16 instead of the 12-14. The material feels very nice and silky smooth. It was a little difficult to pull up, as it has very little give to it. I have a longer torso for most one pieces and tend to buy suits specifically geared towards that. However, length wise, this fit fine. It did not pull, even after I tied it. The cups have a little more padding at the base to help push you up and they are a little thicker than some suits. The bottom up the suit is sewn to the back, or it is one piece in the back. However, in the front the bottom is attached to the liner, and not at the edge of them. Which I thought a little unusual compared to other one's made similarly. It was a little snug at my tummy, which made the front of the suit ride up and you could see the white of the liner, because the bottoms are bikini like in the front. I'm 5'3" if that makes a difference. My husband liked the suit on me. My sister and I did not like the white liner showing. That would make me uncomfortable to keep pulling down the top. I'm sharing some photo's for disclosure, though I wouldn't normally post pictures of me online!

Overall, I like the style and quality of the material.

The color and print are exactly as pictured. The over all quality is top notch. I was able to bend over, slouch, jump and shimmy without any exposure or discomfort. Even without the straps I haven't had to tug on it to keep it up. My only wish is that the band was adjustable. Luckily it fits me well, but as the suit gets older it may stretch (or my weight could change). The clasp looks like it would be easy to move. If you are between band sizes I would advise to buy the larger and take it to your tailor.

reviewText: Really impressed with the quality for such a cheap price.

Bought this for my wife so this is her review of it: I got this swimsuit in the mail yesterday and was pleasantly surprised by how well it fit! It is definitely true to size. I am normally a US size 12, so I went with the size 12-14. I'm sure I could fit into the 10-12 size, but it might be a bit of a squeeze getting it over my hips. Pulling the swimsuit on, it was a little tight around the boob section going over my hips, but that is fairly normal. It also rides up a little while walking, but I think every swimsuit I've owned does that. The leg hole elastic could be a little bit tighter and I think that would solve the problem. The fabric is stretchy and comfortable and I love the beautiful print! It even came in a cute little zip-up bag (super cheap but cute).

The ONLY complaint I have is that the padding is insanely thick! And it's not removable, which is a little disappointing, but that's ok. It makes me look like I have double Ds when I'm barely a C, so it is weird for me, but it still works. It is not the soft padding either, it's the hard shell kind. I will just have to get used to it! It is definitely worth the money. I did get this swimsuit at a discounted price.

I can't wait till summer and the water park opens to be able to use this. Thank you for approving me to try your product at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

reviewText: I purchased this to wear as a maternity swimsuit because of it's flexibility in the belly area.  I love the design and the fabric.  I get lots of compliments for the design and the fabric is very soft and comfortable.  The only thing I wish I considered (because again... I got this as a maternity swimsuit) was the bra size.  It's wired so for any mamas-to-be... I would get 2 sizes up from what you would normally get.  I normally wear a small and got a medium when only considering the belly, but wish I purchased the large to make it more comfortable.
Quality is great. But bra cup is truly small for size.

First of all, I would order a little larger than your normal size. I'm usually a 4, soometimes a 6, so I ordered a medium which is listed as US4-6 but it was still just a bit small when I tried it on (no matter, I'm just using it as extra incentive to shed those last 5 lbs before summer really hits). It is also sliiightly different in color than it appears in the picture: the picture looks more electric blue but the suit itself is really a lovely, true periwinkle. I can't say I'm disappointed by the color at all, I love periwinkle and this is really a lovely shade - matches with the flowers beautifully and is very flattering for my skin color. The suit itself is Very flattering. The bunching along the sides accentuates a nice shape and doesn't appear gaudy (I'm not one for ruffles or those typically fashion-y bunches). I was surprised to find the suit has a firm cup and wasn't sure how that would work out but it looks great, and provides support, so that's pretty awesome. Usually suits with such a quality bra included are Super expensive! So for me, that's just an extra bonus. The straps aren't quite as flattering on me, they are in the middle of the cup rather than the side as I expected - but this is where the slight smallness of the suit really shows on me so I imagine once I get back down to my regular summer size, this won't be a problem at all. Overall, I love the 50's throwback in the pattern, color, and cut - I really want to check out the two piece version they have as well! Full disclosure: I bought this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review.
summary: Soothe my rockabilly heart, gotta love that 50's throwback :)

reviewText:
This is the first swimsuit I have bought that I actually don't mind wearing! I was hoping that the Retro style would be more flattering for my curvy, post baby body. And I am very happy to report that it does!
I was a little surprised that it had "support" built in. I am not complaining, I don't mind the extra help! It does have under wire in it and quite a bit of padding in it. The material is very soft and comfortable to wear. It has a halter top style with a tie so it can be adjusted for any length needed. It is one piece, but almost looks like two. There is a section on the front that comes away from the bottom. It has a underlying fabric, so no stomach is exposed. It is in the ruching, so it just adds to it. It flatters and hides any extra tummy bulge you might not want to be showing.
It fit great! The sizes are not your typical sizes. I normally wear a size 14 and ordered a 4x. It fits like an XL. I have already washed and worn this swimsuit several times and it is holding up great.
Overall, I am thrilled with this swimsuit! It not only looks great, but feels great on! I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

When I received the swim suit it came in a nice little plastic carrier. I really liked that aspect of the packaging because reuse the bag when I go destination swimming. This allows me to change and not worry about getting the car wet, or where to put the suit once I take it off.

The swim suit is beautiful. The colors are vibrant.  Although it's a one piece, the front has two layers. The bottom layer is a nude color and is attached to what would be considered a bottom on a two piece suit. The top layer comes down far enouth that the second lay won't show. I really like this aspect in in bathing suit because it acts a little like a gerdal (Helps suck in the the tummy a little, and helps give shape). The top part (or bra like area) comes with two lays of cushion. One helps keep the bra like shape and the other seems like it's meant to help act like a push up. Not the best fit if you have a bigger chest/breast.

Size wise, it's true to the number. I ordered a 14-16 and it fit like I expected it to fit.

All in all it's beautiful, it's supportive, and the package is reusable.

Disclaimer: This review is my honest option and view on this product. I received this product at a discounted price.

For the price, this is an excellent watch.  It is attractive, keeps good time (not a second off after a week), and the stopwatch function works well.  Many chronograph watches have a second hand on the main dial that is stationary except for using the stopwatch function.  This one uses only two sub-dials (seconds and minutes) for the stopwatch and the sweep second hand on the main dial is for tracking normal time.  That matches my preference.  Hard to judge durability after such a short time but I will say the watchband seems cheap.  It looks all right and the top is genuine leather.  The backing is some sort of vinyl, is not as comfortable as leather, and I suspect it will not last long.
Overall, I'm pleased with my purchase.

Overall this is a very cute one piece bathing suit. I was very excited to try it when I got it. The material is very nice and moves well. The cut is super cute and definitely reminds me of the '50s style bathing suits with a new age addition. However, I was slightly disappointed by a couple things. As I was putting it on it was slightly snug going over my hips (I thought it might tear, but luckily it didn't). After getting it on and tying it up I realized that not only was there underwire, there is also padding in the cups. I had chosen this bathing suit because there was no mention at all whether there was wire or padding. This is a bit of a problem for a girl with a slightly larger than average chest. I am able to make it work by some adjusting, but it's not as comfortable as any other suit where I have the option of no padding.
The single strap behind the neck does hold well with a good snug tie done up. I noticed after having it one that the top part is actually partially disconnected from the bottom piece. I'm guessing this is for a better feel of the bathing suit. There is still netting under that piece, but it's nice how it moves. Hard to explain Hopyfully the pictures help a little to show what I mean.

I really love how great these thick oversized cat eye sunglasses look and feel! This pair of glasses came nicely packed with bubble wrap to ensure protection during the shipping process; the glasses also came with a nice little pouch to carry your glasses when not in use.  The frames are made from plastic and the lens are made with a non-polarized plastic. These glasses state they are for women and one size fits all but with the * next to those I believe this means they could be for men as well and the one size fits all* usually means there is a chance they may not fit someone. These glasses had a perfect fit for me; they were not too tight or too big! The quality of the glasses seems to be excellent; I have had no issues with them cracking or breaking, the lens are still in place and have not popped out at all! They really do a great job at blocking the sun and thats what they are meant to do! So not only do these glasses look great they do their job too!

Amazon disclaimer: This product was provided at little to no cost for the purpose of inspection and an unbiased review.

This skirt is really cute and the fit is a little bigger than I had expected. I'm 5'6", 145 lbs and ordered a medium based on the size chart and other customer reviews; however, I could have probably gotten away with a small. The front waist band sits flat and the rear waist band has an elastic along with a rear zipper, which is why I think I could have gotten away with a small, but the elastic helps to keep the skirt from looking it's too big or too small. Another good thing about the elastic band is that I can now wear the skirt with a sweater or thick top, and still tuck it into the skirt. The skirt sits right on my waist; just below my last rib and above my belly button. The hem of the skirt hits slightly above my knee while the skirt liner hits just 2" above my knee. If I could make this skirt any better would be to add a pocket on each side because I like pockets.
summary: I'd put a ring on it if I could marry a skirt

reviewText: This should not be called a dress and it DEFINITELY shouldn't be called a maternity dress. I'm 5 foot 5, 6 months pregnant and this "dress" doesn't even begin to cover anything. The bottom stopped at the top of my pants. I kept it because I'll wear it as a shirt.

You can wear it when not pregnant, because of the material, it doesn't look like a maternity dress when you wear it when you're no longer preggers. The color is very true to the picture. I got a lot of compliments. It's a mock wrap dress, so you don't have to worry about it coming untied or anything like that.

Very unsatsfied with this purchase. It looks, and feels, like pajamas. I was hoping to wear it to my baby shower but it is too casual. The neckline is very low and with a baby bump, the hem in the front is very high. It works much better as a robe than a dress.

This is a super cute dress. Just make sure to buy it a size up from your other maternity clothes. The cut of the front can gape open and make it look very short so be safe and buy a size up to cover up your bump. I wore it for my baby shower and got lots of compliments. This color is listed as coral, and I thought it looked much closer to a shade of pink than coral.
summary: Buy a size larger than normal.

reviewText: Great!

I'm a 27 year old mom-of-4 and I have huge boobs and wanted something supportive, easy to nurse in, something I could be active in, something cute, and also something modest for a family beach trip.

Depending on what you consider modest, and how big your boobs are, you will love this suit. It felt great and was very flattering. I love halter neck lines because it makes shoulders and my whole top half look more slender. But sometimes the straps cut into my shoulders from the weight. Not so with this because of the actual bra support built into the suit. I could undo the straps to nurse my baby and the cups would not fall down because of the fitted underwire bra!!! It was great!

However, this suit definitely accentuates the bust.  If I hadve been with a crowd of one piece swimsuit friends or ladies much less curvy than me I might've felt uncomfortable with such accentuated boobies. But I was with family and all the ladies were slender and were wearing bikinis and I felt like my busty tankini was great for my mom-body but still looked cute and not old and boring. :)

Overall the fit is great and very secure. It hides tummy fluff and makes the girls look great. I also like how it comes down lower than I expected and almost gave a slight skirt/A-line look to distract from my untoned chubby upper thighs in the crotch area, but the back was still short enough to show a bit of my butt so you could tell it wasn't a swim dress or one piece.

I got the matching bottoms which I also love! Shapewear-ish high waisted matching bottoms!

I'm 5' 7" 140lbs 32H FYI. :)

Please ignore the crazy face I'm making and my unsightly leg bruises in this picture! This is the only full body shot I have in the suit! ;)
summary: Very cute and supportive for big chests!! Hides tummy well.

If I just left it, the weight of the stone pulls it downward and you cant see it, so it just slides off my wrist.
 The first thing I did when I opened them up after sizing them was to paint them with silver nail polish. I followed it with clearcoat.
The silver added a little bulk and texture so they sat a little better on my fingers. The clearcoat was to make sure they do not turn my fingers green. I did not want to take the chance as most non- gold or silver turns me green.
I did not expect these to last more than a summer or two from the get go.
These are just a fun one or two season purchase to complete a look. If they break or if I loose them it's not really a big deal to me. They are fun styles. I think the bracelet will last longer than most of the rings.
summary: Fun to complete a really cool look, just don't expect them to last forever

However the small fit very well. It wasn't too tight or too large.  I also really appreciated the material. I have purchased button up shirts before that have horrible stitching and quality to them. This was not the case with this shirt. i am pleased to say that the material was really good quality and not too thick or thin for a plain shirt.

It was a pretty soft cotton feel which I  did not expect but I am very pleased to have. It does seem like the type of top that will shrink a tad after washing and drying it so just keep an eye out for this, because I know i will. I honestly had no drawbacks about this purchase. It also came in a very nice package with a zip like top so i assume this could be reused technically. I love when the packaging to times has its own style, It lets me know the product has the potential to be good quality.

I have a lot of plaid shirts in my closet from different stores like old navy, target, and Jcpenny. I will say that the quality of this shirt definitely aligned with theses stores if not better because of how it was packaged. The only thing i will add is that initially I was afraid they sent the wrong size because the size in the collar had an "L" on it, but it definitely fit like a small given I am a fairly small person. I like to think i am a pretty picky shopper as well since i have a small torso but large bust size. It is always hard to wear clothes that accommodate me. Usually a top is too long or too tight around my chest. This top fits the bill perfectly though which makes me really happy! I received this product at a discount for unbiased opinion.
summary: Great shirt qulaity nad fitting! I couldn't be happier!

This fit me even though I have glasses on. Which made me happy. It fit my 4 year old pretty good and it fit me pretty good. I also really like the color of the mask and the detail of the math. The headband has little lines and markings which makes it very detailed also the chin is indented and the cheek bones are indented. It was also easy to breathe through which I was surprised because it looks like there aren't many holes. The rubber band around the head fit me pretty well and was comfortable. I work for a couple hours to get a full feel of it. It was really fun to wear and I will be wearing it at my son's pirate birthday. Disclaimer I got this product for free to write an honest review.

The pants can be see through.  That's why you should wear them as leggings and wear a nice long top over them. I am 5-2 and about 170 pounds. The pants fit, but the smaller you are the better they will look. That is with anything in general. Overall the print on these pants is cute. reviewText: Love it, especially color :) blue is very nice... if you want this bag for work I offer for you the size "MEDIUM".

I love this purse!  I'm petite (under 5ft) so everything that seems to be trending is just way too big for my short frame.  This is a small bag, but has plenty of space for all of my modest necessities.  Also, the color is fun and vibrant without being overwhelming.  The material is durable and easy to wash and doesnt appear to scratch or scuff easily.  The purse has 3 sections (2 with snaps and the center zips) plus an inside zipper pocket and two inside pouches, so organization is easy.  I would have given 5 stars if the over-the-shoulder strap wasn't so long.  Even on the smallest adjustment, the purse hangs to mid thigh on me, making it uncomfortable to walk.  I tried wearing as a cross body but the purse is a bit too boxy to pull that off.  It's detachable,  so I removed it and I just carry the bag by the handles, which can be troublesome when you need 2 free hands.  Overall, I'm very pleased.

i actually bought 2 shirts - both long sleeve and both spiderman - one classic and one from civil war.  i've been buying mediums throughout but i wanted to try a small.  sometimes mediums was the smallest size they had.

for me the medium would fit like a fitted shirt - with the slight compression so i wanted to see how the small would fit.  i'm 5'3" 125lbs wait about 28-29" -  if want compression order your true size - at least for the red plume stuff.

the small more compression on the torso but the arms weren't as compressed as i would have liked - well i guess the argument here is i need to work out to get bigger arms.  there is a little pooch of belly on my lower abs - it is tight but not so tight that i can't breathe.  at the wrist the sleeves aren't tight. would have like a snuggier fit at the wrist area.

the print is excellent - like the UA version the back of it does not have that big red spider - the long sleeves does not have any blue to it. the torso part is pretty much exactly like the 'official' UA version - the blue may be a bit more 'royal' than the darker blue from the UA version.  it is a modified version of the 'classic' spiderman

it is presented in a nice zip lock like bag - but it is not watertight but it doesn't have to be.  i have a feeling i bought the last "small" in this print.  with tags at the back cody lundin.  it's smells a little like rubber.  the fabric is really stretchy.

this is a good shirt... great shirt for the price.
summary: can't seem to stop buying the red plume superhero compression shirts

reviewText:
Well... this is awkward.  Here I am reviewing UNDERWEAR.  Yup, underwear.  But if you're reading this right now you know that the struggle is real when it comes to having a nicely shaped perky booty.  I've been working out like crazy but my butt just hasn't quite responded to my endless squats and lunges, at least, not as fast as I've hoped!  Enter butt lift underwear stage right.  I'm not going to lie, I've been researching special underwear to help out my backside for quite a while.  I was between these and the padded kind but those sort of look dated and really unappealing.  I'm testing the waters on these first!  I did do what they suggested and ordered a size up, based on other reviewers experiences.  Good thing, because my normal size would've cut all all circulation to anything under my butt.  I'm usually a small or extra small and I got a medium.  So yes, definitely go up a size so you've got the proper fit.  Heck, maybe even two sizes!  I've seen some reviewers say these are sexy.  I'm gonna say no on that one, though my husband does think these are funny, entertaining even.  But sexy? Nope.  Not my thing!  They're black and sheer so they aren't unfortunate looking, just not like your traditional sexy lingerie. But whatever, these are for FUNCTION, not looks, at least in my book.  Onto the pros and cons!

Here's the good: They DO work.  They lift your booty, yeahh!  They're surprisingly comfortable - I was definitely shocked on that one. They're black and I simply like black underwear.  (I think they have nude as well, by they way)  They arrived a day earlier than expected, so that was an added bonus!!!

Here's the not so good: They run small, though as long as you size up this isn't really a drawback.  They aren't seamless, at least on me, so you can see the line under certain types of clothing: mainly leggings.  This is a big drawback for me because I'm practically the president of the "Leggings are Pants" movement.  I don't want people to look at my butt and see the big circles or a muffin top or my thighs bulging out from the bottom.

These undies do look good, however, underneath regular old jeans, and even under dresses provided that they aren't super thin or made of that awful thin jersey material that shows EVERYTHING. (That material should be banned, by the way.)

All in all, I'd recommend these butt lift underwear because they do what they claim and that's what I was hoping for.  The price is fair, which makes them even more of a power buy.  Quick disclaimer: I was offered a discount to try these out and provide a HONEST unbiased review, so here I am. :)  Four out of my stars in my book.  These are a good buy and worth the money.  Cheers a a rounder, plumper booty - and cheating your way there without a single squat!
I really needed a single 2g for my cartilage and this is perfect since it is metal with a screw on back. I don't have to worry about rubber bands coming off or it coming out! Wear this everyday!
did not fit

I wear a size 6 in underwear and jeans, and I ordered the XL based on the sizing chart. The underwear themselves are not terribly uncomfortable, and they give my booty the most natural looking lift of any shapewear I've tried. However, these don't even come up to my belly button and they give a noticeable muffin top (which I don't usually get). They also cut into my thighs, which isn't flattering and is noticeable under jeans. For the price, I think they are still worth a shot, but I think you'd need to combine some other shapewear with these to get good results.

I'm about a size 10/ 12 and the XLarge worked best for me. Fortunately I already have a nice booty and just wanted these for lifting. If you have a big butt already beware that these will make you look like JLo. I don't mind that though. I've worn them under both spandex and jeans and they make my butt look amazing. I always wear a light weight panty over them so that you don't see the butt cut-out through your leggings.
summary: Run a bit small BUTT work well!

reviewText:
This is my first time to be brave enough and purchase a butt lift underwear. First off, the seller is great, the item was shipped fast and arrived in good condition. I did not follow  followed the size chart and ordered one size up, which was accurate. The panties weren't difficult to put on and were surprisingly comfortable. They also seemed to be good quality.

Now for the bad part.  I bought these with confidence. All it did was cause MAJOR spillage, and I mean major. This product was intended for women that already have a FIRM bum but are looking for a little more lift or "oomph". If you have a jiggly butt whatsoever, save yourself the time and money!! This was not at all designed to cheat your way into a nice butt!

This review has nothing against the seller or product itself, it's just my own body shape and how it translated through these panties. Maybe after several months of squats and lunges my bum might be firm enough to use these, but for now they are banished to the darkest part of my closet.

I used a steam iron and most wrinkles disappeared, but the fabric wrinkles very easily.  Ironing it wasn't easy. Also, the tie does not tie at a natural waist line, more like six inches above and it is a thin piece of fabric. I normally wear a regular size 16, but based on size chart ordered a 16 W or XXXLG. The fit is good. I am posting three pictures for others. Picture (1) right out of the bag; (2) after being washed/dried; and (3) after ironing. The fabric is suppose to be a synthetic, but it clearly isn't one that looks fresh. I will keep the garment, as the event I purchased it for is too near.  Otherwise, this blouse would definitely be returned.

I thought the style would be nice also, but I didn't realize I'd love it that much.  This jumpsuit looks like it's straight out of the 70s, so I love it even more because I grew up in the 70s! You better make sure you're comfortable with your body because this material is very soft, light and fits almost like a second skin in certain parts (even though the pants are a little wider at the leg).  But it WILL show your curves so you'd better be comfortable in it!  Very classy and I love that I can either wear it casual with a pair of flats or dress up with some nice heels or booties!  It's too bad it doesn't come in other colors, but the Army green is not as bad as I thought.  Perhaps it's because I have olive skin so I like how it looks.  )

The shirt arrived quickly enough.  Maybe too quickly.  I'm guessing the decal had not cooled off yet when the shirt was folded and placed in the package because the decal was sticking to other parts of the decal that it was folded over on (see pictures).  So when I unfolded the shirt for the 1st time, small parts of the decal ripped off to give it a retro look.  There's also a pretty bad chemical smell from the decal.  I'm sure it can be washed out, but I don't know how many washes you'll get out of this shirt before the decal is totally ruined.  This shirt is NOT worth the money which is sad because there is a market for this product.  My package was also missing a receipt.
summary: Decal was still wet when folded!

reviewText: Overall, the shirt is nice, although the decal on the front is definitely made from a material that is not as durable. You do not want to use heat on it whether through washing or drying, otherwise the decal will stick to itself or the shirt. If you try to tear it away then pieces of the decal will tear with it. I've been using a cold wash and air dry without heat and it seems fine. I also pull the shirt inside out so the decal is facing inside. The shirt could be improved, but equally people need to know how to wash it. Instructions should be provided with the shirt, but they are not.
summary: The Shirt is good, decal not so much

I bought these undies for many reasons, but my top two are as follows:
1) Because we EC our children (look up "Go Diaper Free" or Elimination Communication) and they have both switched from diapers to undies by about 15mo.
2) Because my girls are very petite and still don't fit in generic 2t3t undies.

My youngest daughter was 15mo and 17lbs and fit perfectly in the 12-18 months with room to grow. She's now 19mo, 20lbs, and I just switched her to the 18-24mo, and once again, they fit perfect with a little room to grow without being too baggy. {SEE PHOTO)
My oldest daughter has been wearing the 2T since she was 19mo and 21lbs. She's now 3.5y, 28lbs, and still wears them comfortably.
These tiny undies are the softest I have ever found, even after trying different brands of generic, big store brands. The waist band is nice and thin, and is easily manipulated by my toddler since 17mo.
The leg holes fit my average sized girls well, without making lines or being too loose.
The colors are deep and beautiful, and don't fade with many many washes.
There is only one seam in the crotch area and it doesn't sit where it would irritate the sensitive parts.
I have never been so excited about my girls clothing as I am with these undies. I have 6 pairs for each girl and it seems a perfect amount. I bought each size in a different color so my hubby can easily tell which one goes to which girl.
I will never buy generic undies ever again. I plan to buy the smaller sizes for our new baby to wear, and I am very excited about the possibility of training undies!
summary: Soft, perfect fit undies for toddlers;buy these even if they fit generic undies

reviewText:
Got the navy/red/yellow/green strap because there wasn't a black/red/yellow/green.  It looks more like a rainbow on your wrist in person - not what I was going for.  The stitching was crooked, the holes were unevenly sized and crooked.  Got a different model band from Clockwork Synergy and it was even worse. That one was too wide and the material didn't compress at all, so it would be extremely difficult to remove once it was on your watch.  The inner edges of the band where it is burned to seal the edges has sharp corners and had to be nipped off with scissors, even then it was *itchy and scratchy* against the skin.  Couldn't just drop it off at the UPS store with my other returns either since UPS is a ripoff for small, low value items.  Had to go to the USPS which is only open when I'm at work, and I work 7 days a week and pay for my own return shipping.  All in all, it was two bad experiences out of two purchases and a hassle.  The straps I would rate 2-3 stars but the overall buying experience is 1 star. Would not recommend or buy from again.

My suggestion is to get a nato strap from Zuludiver / Geckota.  It costs a bit more but the straps are a lot more refined and much higher in quality.
summary: The navy/red/green/yellow looks like a rainbow on the wrist

reviewText: I absolutely LOVE this dress!! The design is classic yet unique with the pleating, and the fit is amazing. I tried on dozens of dresses for the wedding I'm going to attend and none of them held a candle to this dress in fit or price! I am 5'3" and 150lbs, an hourglass/pear shape at 37-27-40, and the size 10 is great (the top may have fit a little better in an 8, but then would have been too snug to look good on the hips). The material is 97% polyester and 3% spandex, and has the feel of thin jersey, but in black it does not show imperfections/cellulite at all. Great flow and length - the hem sits just above the ground in 4 inch heels on me. The stitching is coming out in one of the pleats, but will be easy to throw a few stitches in to fix. I will post pictures if I get the chance!

reviewText:
This dress is absolutely cute!! The picture is not deceiving at all.

I am currently in the middle of a weight loss journey. When you've lost 75 pounds and have 45 more to go, you need to find clothes that fit. However you can't afford a new wardrobe now and again in 45 pounds. This dress was a perfect addition.

The fit of the dress was what I expected. Chinese manufactured items like this tend to run small, so I always order a size up. I'm currently wearing an xl in most clothes, so I got a 2xl in this.

The material reminds me of a dry fit spandex type feel. It is very stretchable, but extra lightweight. I love that it is quarter sleeve as well. I like to hide my bat wings, and this dress does that nicely.

The length of the dress is also perfect. I'm 5'7 and it falls right at my ankle. I wouldn't want it any shorter or longer.

My one complaint about this dress is that the material does not hide any imperfections. As you can see in the photo, it definitely shows the bra bulge. You don't even want to see my back fat. I think with an appropriate sweater though it will be fine, since it isn't tight in the stomach or below. If possible, I'll order an extra size up next time.

Overall, I can't complain about a dress that I only paid $4 for.
If you need a cheap maxi dress for daily use, I definitely recommend grab if this one.
summary: Doesn't hide back fat, but is still a good dress for daily wear!

reviewText: I'm pleasantly surprised, this dress fits me better than I thought  probably because the material doesn't cling and although it's somewhat former fitting, it's like enough to hide all the extra pounds if you have some, I simply love this dress, I plan to order another! [Note: this is for the blue and gold colorway]. These are a pretty convincing copy of Dior's Technologic sunnies. When it comes to ordering sunglasses online it is a crap shoot every time even when specks are included and in this case, they thankfully turned out to be the perfect, slightly over sized aviator with beautiful deep blue lenses I was looking for. This particular color seems to be a big trend this year and its great to buy these instead of spending on a trend that may only last a few minutes.

It does seem that based on what color you purchase, the sizing might be different. On some people these can look huge and on others normal. Mine in this blue color are about 6 inches at the widest top crossbar area. The lenses themselves are about 2 and a quarter long. I did notice that men seem to prefer this style over the So Real frames also by Dior as these come out wider at the temples. These glasses have a nice weight to them but the arms feel very loosely screwed. It concerns me they might break/fall off. These also came with a black dust bag. Overall mine came exactly as pictured and are holding up well with a quality slightly better than F21 or H and M.

reviewText:
My friend's son is five years old and is absolutely obsessed with bow ties.  Living in the south, these are not just for formal wear.  Many young boys and young men wear them for casual wear as well.  They look great with just a white shirt and khakis.  He just started kindergarten this week so I got this set for him and gave it to him.  It was so cute how excited he was about them.  These come individually wrapped which is really nice should you want to not give them all to the same person. The variety of colors in this collection is great.  It includes red, light blue, yellow gold, purple, gray, navy blue, and two styles in black. The purple and gold colors are the his school color so my friend was really happy those were included. He actually wore the gold one on his first day of school. It was a real hit because who doesn't love a sharp dressed kindergartner?  They all have subtle white polka dots except for the navy, red and one of the blacks which have polka dots that are the same color as the bow tie.  They bow ties are pre-tied and made of a nice quality polyester.  The neck band is adjustable on them and the clip is easy to open and close.  He can even do it himself.  These ties are just perfect for his age and size.  They are made really well and I am so happy they liked them.
I purchased these bow ties at a discount or free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.  These are so darn cute.
summary: Who Doesn't Love A Sharp Dressed Kindergartner?

reviewText: I couldn't ask for more. These are absolutely perfect. Yes I live up to my name and I bought these for my cat. He just looks so handsome in a tie. Anyway this is a great assortment and a very reasonable price. You really can't find a better deal then this. They're well made and super adjustable. The clip isn't made for cats. By that I mean when you clip it it won't pop open unless you push it. So for human children that's a plus. As they can't rip it off. However for pets it's a little bit of a safety issue. So I only put them on him when I'm home. It's not a difficult clip though. So I can see older kids being able to put this on and take it off no problem. The assortment is great and the colors are true to the photo. Like I said I really can't ask for more. I am a very happy customer and feel more then comfortable recommending these.

reviewText: I must go through a half a dozen pairs of sunglasses each year or more, from either pure loss and can't find them, to breakage, to other people lifting them from my car and more. When I got the DUCO New Polarized Sports Sunglasses Pack, I knew these would be keepers. They have a simple sporty, sexy, and absolutely cool look to them. On an extremely functional level, they are Polarized sports sunglasses with an unbreakable frame. Not all sunglasses are polarized and usually this can cost a premium. The polarized lenses in these sunglasses offer real 100% UV400 protection coating, blocking 100% harmful UVA and UVB rays. The sporty look and shape plus the UV value provide anti-glare protection against water or snow reflection or other bright lights. Love the included extras including tune up screw driver, microfiber cleaning cloth and microfiber soft case, and a hardshell case with solid metal carabiner for clipping on a backpack. reviewText: Great quality springbars. You'll never need to buy anymore with the variety and amount they give you.

The spring bars seem fine.  The box is really terrible.  The box has zero closure mechanism, so it comes taped together.  When you remove the tape, the entire outer edge is covered in sticky residue.
The lid of the box has zero closure, no click into place, no pressure closure nothing.
So, here is a sticky box full of tiny objects whose top does not close.  It sticks to your fingers and jars the spring bars.  If you want to wipe the edges clean with something watch out if you jostle the box the lid gets ajar and the bars jump into the wrong slots.
the last straw was my forgetting how badly made it is and my trying to put the box into my coat pocket, the lid came off immediately and the bars spilled across their trays and into my pocket.
A new product should not require gunk removal upon arrival.  And any kind of functional box like this should have some kind of closure mechanism.
summary: The spring bars seem fine. The box is really terrible

The size of these hats are ridiculous. The has I received was 64cm.  Which is the equivalent of a 3XL hat. And 3cm  larger than the largest size in the range listed in the ad. Additionally, that range is too large a variance to be reasonable in the first place. The size range on the ad; 58cm to 61cm is the equivalent range of a 7 1/4 to 7 5/8. This is a huge range for a hat so even if you happen to be in that range and you get a hat in the advertised range  the chance of getting a hat that fits well is about 1 in 3. Additionally, my hat was MUCH larger than the advertised range.

I do not think there are many people in the world with a 3XL head size.

I was able to get a refund but the hat is completely useless. It is comically large.

If you have a huge head this may be the best option for you. Because no other imperial hat on the market comes in sizes this huge.
summary: While the quality is pretty good the sizing is completely ridiculous.

reviewText: I took a bit of a chance when I ordered this necklace as it's not something that I would normally wear. I've always been more comfortable wearing pendant style necklaces, and this one was a little bit grand. It is a beautiful necklace, but unfortunately I don't have much in my closet that I can quite make this work with. The yellows and ambers, maroons and reds are very earthy, almost autumn colors. They don't lend to a spring or summer wardrobe very effectively. The necklace length is about right, but a little long. In the picture you can see one of the strands that hangs a little lower, and that is precisely what I received. I've actually adjusted that strand to not droop, which, I imagine, is probably going to ruin the look of it, but it makes me feel better. The gold necklace is more antique brassy than a true gold. I believe the whole necklace was designed to have a retro look to it, and it achieves a quite nicely. The beads are nicely designed, and the variety is well-balanced. Like I said, this is a necklace more designed for a fall winter wardrobe and for somebody who doesn't mind making a bit of a statement. I received this product at a discount for my fair and honest review, and in no way has this influenced my review of this necklace.
summary: A necklace well suited for autumn and winter wardrobes.

reviewText:
This necklace is much more substantial than I was expecting!  The chain is a bit thicker to support the multiple strands of stones and the weight of it makes it feel like an expensive piece of jewelry!  The stones are different sizes and colors, making this necklace really versatile when it comes to dressy, casual, and the number of color choices you can pair it with.  I wore it with a dark brown top and got a ton of compliments on it because the colors really popped against the dark background.  This has a standard lobster clasp, but the clasp is just a touch larger than a standard one, which I would expect with the thicker chain.  My youngest (13 months) put the chain through its paces by trying to yank it off my neck and it withstood her so it is pretty solid!!

Because it is so tall, ~4-7/8" and US money is ~2-5/8", it seems to get lost in the wallet.  Not being able to open all the way makes it hard to sort through the money or anything else you have in the two bill compartments.

I don't use the zipper pocket for coins, but found it useful for a number of the smaller keychain sized store cards.  While not perfect it should be fine once I get used to it.

reviewText: I'm a huge janet fan.

I hate to leave such a negative review, but the dress I received is so much different than the one pictured, I feel it important anyone interested be aware... The dress I received resembled it close enough to know I hadn't accidentally been given the wrong item- it was white, the texture of the fabric looked the same, it was white... But I had expected a flowy, relaxed construction, deep v, 3/4 sleeve skater mini dress... The dress I received was made of a very stiff fabric in top, then several layers of tulle underneath (think tutu or petticoat  material) which made the skirt very puffy and stay in place when moving around/feel very structured.  The sleeves came just above my elbow, and the v was just mid- chest/a couple inches past the collarbone- nowhere near the picture where it extends passed the bra line, and came down to just above my knees (I'm 5'7"). To be clear, the dress wasn't ugly, but it wasn't what I wanted. I possibly could have made it work for what it was, but unfortunately the fabric was so stiff, it wasn't just uncomfortable, it was painful to have on while trying it on, there was no way I would have survived a day wearing it. Aside from the pain being the main reason I returned this, it also just wasn't flattering on me and made me feel like I was in a tutu when I hoped for a light, sleek dress for summer:(

When I travel, I plan to keep my passport, cash, and any important documents in this pouch and around my neck, which gives me peace of mind; 3. The RFID protection for passports is important to have these days; 4. The luggage tags that are included are very good quality, and with their inclusion, the deal for the pouch is pretty darn good.

I recently traveled to a different country and this was exactly what I was looking for. It was big enough to carry all my essentials such as my credit cards, passport and important papers, but still comfortable to wear around my neck. It also helped me feel more secure carrying around important items that I frequently needed access to.  I also liked that the strap was adjustable and could be worn around the neck or as a crossbody. The quality of the item also impressed me for the price point it was being offered at. And the heather gray is the perfect neutral color. My husband usually wears black, gray, or navy shirts so I'm glad I was able to find this shirt on one of those colors.

The fabric is soft and fits comfortably. The graphic has held up well to several washings and has even gone through the dryer with no sign of fading or peeling.

I ordered my husband an extra large and the shirt fits as expected. He usually wears a large or an extra large. Sometimes when ordering, sizes tend to run on the small side - especially when ordering a product made or shipped from Asia. For this reason, I ordered the larger size and I'm so glad I did. It fits perfectly and hasn't shown any sign of shrinking in the washer or dryer.

I ordered this shirt for my husband, he loves to ride bicycles. He is slowly amassing a huge collection of T-shirts to reflect this. To give you an Idea on sizing, he is 6ft 5 and about 230lbs. We always order at least a size bigger than he would need for his weight because of his height, especially because he is tall through his torso. So in this we got him a XXL. The length was good for him and it fit similar to other shirts we have that are the same size (it is hard to find tall T-shirts!)

The quality of this T-shirt is very nice. The fabric is very soft. The fabric is thinner- which we love because we live in South Florida and heavy T-shirts are reserved for winter (ha ha). It is light enough that he has worn it to ride his mountain bike. Speaking of, it washes up very nice. I do not dry his T-shirts so I can not say how well it dries. But it has become one of his favorite shirts and I have wasted it at least 10 times and it is still holding up great.

The graphics on this are printed on very well and have also held up to multiple washings. This shirt is especially perfect because we eat a diet very similar to paleo.. which is often called the caveman diet. He wore this to a biking club get together and received several compliments on it- there were even a few people that suggested he ride with a loin cloth...I hope that was a joke! Overall he is happy with his shirt, I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest, unbiased review.

I can tell they won't stretch out after just a couple uses like all the rest I've tried, and they are a little more hefty than most. My ponytail is 4" in circumference and I can wrap these three times around for a pony, twice for a bun (and I use several for security). They're a touch wider than most but not into scrunchie territory. Soft, with minimal hair breakage. I'm pretty happy with these!

reviewText: These are the perfect elastic hair band pony tails.  They are very stretchy, so they end up being tight and staying that way.  These are not like the dollar store stretchies where it's elastic encased in another layer of fabric - those stretch out and become 'stale' or lose their stretch over time.  These have NO seams, nor glue, nor metal, nor anything else that will grab and catch hair.  This is literally the perfect hair band, size, tightness, stretchiness, not pulling hair, and so on.

They fit perfectly on my small wrist, they are thicker than normal Goody elastics, and there is no metal piece that could scratch you or thin out in that section. Highly recommended, will repurchase depending on how long they last before stretching out. I have very thing hair, if that helps.

reviewText: Really like the shirt.  Good fit for a medium.  I generally wear mediums, and they fit close, but not tight, and this was great.  There was no noticeable shrinkage after washing it.  Colours have stayed true after several washings (so far).  The sleeves are a little lighter than the picture shows, but not significantly.  Shipping was a lot faster than Amazon indicated it would be.  I think it took just over a week, eight or nine days, and claimed to be shipping from England or something.  Amazon gave an outrageous estimate (three weeks or something like that), so it coming in a lot earlier was very nice.
Had this watch for a year now. I love it.

I purchased this watch in November of 2016. The watch was delivered quickly in a box and surrounded by bubble wrap. The actual watch was neatly packaged within a separate cushioned box.
Very attractive watch at a modest price and it has been keeping somewhat accurate time. Runs about 3 seconds fast every month. The date and day display are easy to read, and it is easy to adjust both or either date and day when necessary. I have had no problems at all with the watch and recommend it to anyone. I wear the watch to work, but you can also wear it casually. The band is leather and looks great.

This is my second Burei watch. I purchased a more expensive Burei Stainless Steel Chronograph watch in Nov of 2015. This watch has been very good, keeps accurate time.

reviewText: The most comfortable bra ever..I am a 34AA which means I am super flat chested. No more padded underwire! The cups aren't huge but have just enough to give some shape. Super comfortable, the padding makes it appear as if I am wearing a real bra, without the struggles of a regular underwire bra. No nips popping thru either. ;) I do have a pretty flat chest so I certainly am not in this for the support and can't attest to that. These are for sure going to be my go-to daily bra.

I can see why this could be a great product but only if one size really fit everyone. If you are size B or C don't even think of getting these. These are meant for A cup sizes or probably smaller. I can see how they can be super comfy for those sizes. I tried these on as an alternative to nursing bras but they actually ending up hurting me pretty bad after an hour or so. I would definitely buy these if they comes in larger sizes.

reviewText:
I purchased this top in grey in the XXL size and I am 5' 6.5" tall and weigh 210 lbs.  I wear a US size 18W in pants. The top was loose (I'm about a 38-40D), but I carry most of my weight in my stomach area. It hung over my belly just fine, but was very unflattering. The reason I rated this as "somewhat small" is that the short sleeves were snug/tight around my arms, but otherwise, it's extremely loose fitting.

It was made out of a t-shirt material and was comfortable when I tried it on, but it looked like a mu-mu on me, so I returned it. I briefly thought about keeping it as a sleep shirt, but even then, I just couldn't justify it since it really was quite unflattering on my body type . . . even as a sleep shirt.
summary: I think this top would be cute on a smaller person in a smaller size. However, it looked and felt like a tent on me!
