I thought that I finally found a long sleeved black casual dress when I ordered this Myobe Women's V Neck Long Sleeve A-Line Casual Short Dress/ Tunic.  I was initially excited to see the length was going to be a good fit for me.  I am 5.2 and a lot of dresses are way too long. After reading a few comments about the small sizing, I decided to order a medium for the dress (even though I typically would have ordered a small). The material was thin but not where I would have to wear anything underneath.  I was disappointed when trying it on to find out that the sleeves were way too tight for my arms.  It was so tight that although I was able to squeeze my arms in the dress, I feared that once i washed it, that may not even be a possibility if any shrinkage occurred.  There were no washing instructions on the dress. Therefore, I am sorry to say that the dress doesn't fit me. I would recommend that you order 2 sizes larger than you would typically order.

I was able to receive this product at a very nice discount in exchange for sharing my honest opinion and my overall review of the positives and pitfalls of the product. When I buy a product, I always rely on the customer reviews as my best source of information when deciding between similar products. I rely on reviews from people who are using the actual product / item.  I find these opinions are the most informative and valuable for me to make my purchase decision.  The information I have provided here is sincere and unbiased. I wish you the best in all your shopping experiences!

I think this dress is definitely worth the money, it was good quality and not see through, huge plus.  I will have to look into investing in a larger size.  I would say order a size up just because it is cotton and it could possibly shrink. I received this product at a discount for my honest opinion, I hope you found my review helpful.

It has come to be my understanding that these cheaper, 'knock-off' clothes purchased direct from China need to be ordered several sizes bigger than what one would normally wear.  I ordered an xl, which is what size I always wear, and I am not even going to bother trying to get it on.  It is obvious from pulling it out of the bag it was shipped in that it is going to be way too tight.  The sleeves even appear to be sewn very small and it is not dress length when held up against me.

The dress appears to be well made otherwise, the fabric is soft and not scratchy or see through.

Another complaint is that, should this item and others from this seller, arrive and be too small - even though their size chart indicates that it should fit - you will have to pay for the return shipping.  In my opinion, that's not right.

I recieved this item at a discount for my fair, unbiased review.  Rest assured I only recommend products my family and I use, I have no problems giving poor reviews for poor products - and great reviews for great products! - regardless of how great the discount.

As other reviews have stated, this A-line "dress" is NOT a dress.  Nor does it fit well.  It's clearly Asian sizing, so for this woman, it didn't fit.  For an XL, it fits quite snug along my torso and barely covers my behind.  If you're petite, this would more than likely work well for you.  If you want the fit of the pictured product, look further.  I was hoping for better.  I'm sure I will find a use for this shirt, probably under a winter vest or sweater.

reviewText: Love it, very pleased with it
Worth the money and came just as I expected! Perfect color. I got the burgundy one and it was so beautiful. Definitely a heavy dress but perfect for prom!
Lots of compliments

Purpose:  Senior Prom, Spring 2017 -- ordering early for senior pictures.

Overall:  Material, quality and craftsmanship are excellent and on par with boutique dresses we have tried in the $300-$500 range.  The beading is delicate, sophisticated, and beautiful -- photos do not do it justice.  Absolutely gorgeous dress overall.

Alterations Needed:  Extra midriff liner, trim train.

Shipping:  Fast, but not accurate -- we ordered burgundy but received red.  Returning and reordering.

Sizing:  Like many other posters recommend:  when in doubt, size up!  We measured carefully and used the size guide as instructed and although the dress fit, it is quite tight in the arms and across the neckline.  She could wear it, but it would probably not be comfortable by the end of the night.  Since we have to return to get the correct color, we are going to size up.

Modesty/Appropriateness:  The fit is lovely and elegant.  The built-in bra is supportive and the mermaid fit through the torso and hips is feminine but not body-con.  The overall look is age-appropriate -- grown-up but not "old".  The skirt is fully lined.  The top is somewhat sheer on the midriff and back.  There are a few small areas in the midriff detail design where there is sheer fabric against skin that in some lights can appear slightly see-through.  Our dress code is particularly conservative; to be on the safe side, we would have a seamstress insert a second liner in that part of the bodice.

Color:  We ordered burgundy but unfortunately, were shipped the red.  The red is actually quite lovely, a cross between crimson and cherry, but it's not what we wanted so we are going to reorder and hopefully will get the right color this time.

Length/Weight:  We measured carefully as instructed -- hollow of the throat to the floor with heels -- and the length is exactly what the website said it would be.  However, the train is VERY long and VERY heavy.  My daughter really wants a lot of train this year but even she thinks this is too much and so the other alteration we'll need to make is to trim the train.
summary: quality and craftsmanship are excellent and on par with boutique dresses we have tried ...

reviewText: Dress was exactly the same as in the picture.  My daughter fell in love with a dress at a boutique, but I didn't love the price, it was $245.  So, I suggested that she get on Amazon and try to find a similar dress to that one of the boutique.  Well, she chose this one, in royal blue.  The color of the dress is beautiful and the beading is exquisite.  Her usual dress size is 7 , but I didn't want to order the size 8, for fear of it being to big.  Well the size 6 fit her like a glove.  The material is somewhat stretchy, so that helps give the mermaid illusion as it hugs every curve.  She is really going to enjoy wearing this dress for her prom.  Also the seller was really helpful.  I needed this dress in less than two weeks and I messaged the seller as soon as I ordered it and they responded very quickly.  The seller said they hand make the dresses as they are ordered, so the dress wasn't even made yet.  The seller said they would put a rush on it and try their hardest to get it done quickly so they could ship and it get here on time.  It was delivered yesterday by DHL.  Took nine days total time for a hand made, beautiful dress fit for a princess.  Awesome Service!

Really nice quality product-like the scales

When this wallet arrived it was not was depicted, it was mostly though.
The ID pocket depicted shows an ID packet that inserts into half of the wallet.
Mine has a window sewn into that location.  Mine also arrived with a 3rd flap sewn into the half-way mark of the wallet; this extra flap also has an ID style window and 2 additional CC slots on the opposite side of this flap, and an extra pocket under those two addition CC slots. It also has an exterior pocket that I don't see on the ad, I did not consider this a negative  just unexpected.
The wallet that arrived area wise is slightly bigger than my worn-out old eel skin wallet but is thinner.
This wallet (bill-fold) also seems like it doesnt open as youd think it would. Though it's working smoother/wider as the leather gets worked.
So when I received this wallet I was disappointed as it wasn't what I thought it would be.  I considered sending it back for not being what was depicted. However, after sleeping on it, I figured Id try it out and moved my contents from my old wallet to this one.  It is thinner and that felt better, everything from the old one did fit  so functionality was achieved and I became more satisfied.  The aesthetic appeal from the ad was meant and the construction/workmanship is worthy/durable looking  a big appeal to me.
Ive been using it now a few days, and I like it. Glad I continued to give it a chance.  Now its just a matter of time to verify its durability, but it does seem like it will last and take abuse.

Legit! This is not like the other perfect slim gator wallets that cost $100 plus but it is a very nice wallet for what it is. Construction is very very good and it has plenty of room for all your stuff. This is a legit gator wallet that has what some would call imperfections but I define as character. I think this roughness adds to the overall appeal of this piece. It's very utilitarian/rugged.

I did have a small issue with the window on the inside of the wallet coming unglued and my card corner poked out the side. I remedied this temporarily by lifting the flap and re-tucking the window under the flap. I will need to use some super glue and apply with a needle point and that should fix it back. I considered sending it back but I just like it too much to send it back so I will make due.

The description is a bit off but there are 6 slots for credit cards, 2 windows (front/back), two inside slots (either side), double bill separator plus a zippered bill compartment, and there is also an exterior slot at the spine. Very nice set up. It is a bit bigger/longer than a standard size wallet but just by a bit and also quite a bit thicker (though this is compared to a well worn used wallet that it is replacing).

I will probably be ordering this in brown as well. I think this is a very fair price for this piece and would even say it's quite a deal.
summary: Great deal on a wallet with character!

reviewText: Love it, once it came in

This wallet is fantastic, especially at this price. It looks awesome, and the layout is the same as my current wallet, with an additional (useful) partition or two. I believe it really *is* genuine croc leather, as the scales lift up partially on one side, and the dimples are visible on the scales.

Be advised that it is a bit larger than most "standard" sized wallets (maybe 3/4 in larger horizontal and vertical than the Fossil its replacing), and that because it is a leather product it will need some breaking in.

Had to mention the seller: I was originally given the wrong tracking number. My tornado-hit house is being rebuilt, so my regular mail goes to a PO box while my packages are delivered here. After missing the ship date, I contacted Thumb Up about it and they were nothing but prompt, courteous and persistent. Tracked down the correct number for me, all the delivery info, and most importantly which apartment mailbox it was at.

Awesome customer service team, I'll be using them again. Great croc wallet too!.
summary: 5/5 for wallet, 10/5 for customer service if i could

reviewText: This wallet makes a GREAT first impression, especially for the price. It is extremely well laid out.  The workmanship looks first rate. reviewText: It was a gift. She loved it!

This sterling sliver heartbeat lifeline plus necklace is so adorable! Honest what girl doesn't need a heart necklace? I know it is one of my go to shapes, and this is is no acceptation. I love wearing this on different occasions , mostly more "formal" ones that I do not want my necklace to stick out since it is rather subtle which I enjoy. It is so pretty, and truly goes with any outfit that you would wear. It is sterling sliver which I love,since I won't break out or get a green neck from wearing it to much even if it isn't gold. The chain is honestly the perfect length for me, so no complaints at all. I also want to talk about the packaging, which is so fantastic! it comes in a square black box, then inside of that box is a triangle shaped black glittery box. Then the necklace is  is plastic, the heart piece separated from the necklace so it doesn't get tangled. overall I truly love this necklace and it is so pretty and defiantly a part of my almost everyday jewelry wear.
- I did receive this product for free in return for my honest and unbiased opinion. All statements in this review are strictly from my own personal experience with this product.

A very lovely and delicately designed treasure by Harmony Jewelry Company. The Heartbeat Lifeline Pulse is 9.25 silver and stamped as such giving it the wonderful ability to last her a lifetime if cared for properly. It has dazzling little CZ's all around the small heart. The chain itself is also very dainty and made for your average sized woman or teenage girl.
I know for a fact that this design is a big favorite among teenagers. My daughter has dawn and painted this design over and over. She instantly fell in love with this necklace when she laid eyes on it so I made it a special little gift from me to her. She was thrilled!
It came in a gorgeous gift box, with a little cleaning cloth to help keep that bright polished shine. It arrived very quickly, well packaged, and untangled. The photos do not do justice to how lovely it really is.
I happily received the Heartbeat lifeline pulse necklace in exchange for my honest opinion and review.
summary: A very lovely and delicately design.

Let me first start off by laying out my current situation. I am a curvy woman. I normally wear a size 13/14 in pants, L-XL in tops and a full size 38D in bras. I ordered this swimsuit in a size XL (as the size chart suggested)  and in the color black. There was no doubt that this is the swimsuit that I wanted. It looks sexy yet retro.

The top is a very long strip of fabric that you simply wrap around your torso, criss cross in the front and tie in the back of your neck. It took me a minute or two to figure it out. You'll probably end up referring to the seller's picture for referencing :-) The bottom is high waisted. The style is definitely aligned with this year. In terms of the fit, the top is long enough to cover your beauties to an extent. You'll notice in my pictures that there is a small area that shows. This is a call out for those that are more body conscious, but then again, this is a sexy swimsuit. The bottom was a bit on the smaller side for me. Didn't have enough stretch to it where I felt comfortable or where I felt that I could get away with wearing without someone else calling it out. This is evident in my pictures. Again, I have to stress that I am a curvaceous woman. Everyone has different bodies, so it may fit better on yours.

I received this swimsuit at a discounted price in return for my unbiased and honest review.

This is a two piece swimsuit.  It is a high waist bottoms.  There were a tad bit smaller than I would have expected for the size that I purchased.  The top is one long piece of material that has to be wrapped and twisted to get the effect of this bathing suit.  I found that with it being one long piece, the top could be worn in different ways.  It was really interesting trying to come up with multiple ways to wear it.  Due to myself being a DDD, the amount of cloth would not cover all of what I needed.  It had to run it differently from the picture to obtain coverage.  I received this item for a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.
summary: The wrap bathing suit that can be used in multiple different ways.

reviewText: The material is horrible. Find another company.

It's a really sexy looking suit! It really is.. And I was so excited to get it for my girls trip to Vegas, however; It just doesn't work for my body type. I ordered three different colors (white, black, red), all size M, because I couldn't decide which I really wanted. All three were made differently, which doesn't reflect it in the images.
First off, the white - the bottoms were seriously just granny panties. The garters in the waistband and the legholes were too tight, but the material ballooned on me. And it fell about an inch below my belly button. The white top was the only one of the three that was double layered.
Now, for the black suit - I think out of the three this was the one I liked best. The bottom had an almost seamless look once you had it on. This had the best fit without being too loose and it covered up to my belly button. Unfortunately, the top was just a long price of cloth that was cut out. They didn't even bother sewing in seams on it. The length though was long enough that you could have played around with it in order to find different ways to tie it.
Annnd the red - the material for this had a shine to it and it was very stretchy. The bottom reach all the way under my breast. After putting that on I didn't even bother messing with the top. The top's seams were sewn too tight that it looked like it was ruffled. It was also shorter in length than the other two tops.
As much as I loved the look of it in the images, it just didn't work out for me. I'll be returning them shortly.

reviewText:
The designs are basic, but the product is sturdy.  If you're looking to start a tie bar collection but don't have a lot to spend, look no further. Let's get to it, here is the good, the bad, and the does-this-thing-even-work for the PurryRing Formal Tie Clips.

THE GOOD
The clips on these tie bars are strong and sturdy.  When I put them on, I don't have to worry about it slipping or coming loose.  The bar might become slightly askew from time to time, but I don't think that's avoidable.  Also, they look nice, even though they aren't very expensive. Lastly, the back of the tie bar is very wide so that it can fully cover the tie and stay in place.

THE BAD
The designs are very basic and they aren't all that great, but for the price, I'm not very upset about it.

THE DOES-THIS-THING-EVEN-WORK
Yes, they do work well.  They are entry level, but they will still turn heads and get you a thumbs up for passing masses.

*Disclaimer: I received this product at a reduced rate for my unbiased opinion.  This in no way affected my review.
summary: A great way to start your tie bar collection!

reviewText:
This dress may have been someone who is about another dress size larger than me and also about a foot taller. I read the sizing chart and thought it would work. I wish I could make this dress work but it has extremely scratchy material to the point where I can see that if I wore this the whole day for my wedding my skin would be red from irritation. I am a really petite person about 105 lbs and 5ft 3in tall and bought a size 2 (starting to question if what I was sent is a size 2). Even if I were to hem this dress or alter it (which I was prepared to do),  I would lose a lot of the beautiful lace detail at the bottom of the skirt. This is the first real hiking backpack I have ever purchased for myself. I was also very nervous to spend money on this, seeing that it had not been previously reviewed by any other customers. When it arrived, I was so excited about how the material felt, and opened each compartment and just marveled a bit. I sat down and wrote a quick email to the company letting them know that I was already happy with my purchase, and asked a few questions, but never received an email back, which I was slightly disappointed about. I hope when they get the chance, that they can answer me back.

I finally had the opportunity to use this, not on a hike, but on a trip to Seaside, Oregon that I just took this last weekend, so I got to wear it while I walked the beach, and went geocaching with friends. It is very comfortable! I was able to fit my 2L Hydration Bladder in the elastic flat inner pocket inside of the main zipper area. There is a top zipper compartment which also has a smaller netted zipped area inside. A vertical zipped pocket in the front center. There are two adjustable elastic hooks on either side of this pocket which allows you to pack rolled up items outside of the backpack. I actually love that part the most. There are two yellow loops at the front base of the backpack (as you can see in the ad here). I have seen these on other hiking backpacks before, but have only ever seen elastic bands. These are just a regular material and have no stretch. I suppose I could use the loops for any tie downs or carrying rope, etc. That was actually my question to the seller, asking them what they intended for those loops.

Finally, there are two water bottle/beverage pockets on the side. (Yes you can see one of the wine bottles I carried around with my girlfriends on our trip). They are elastic edged, with netting, and then have two buckle clips right above to assist in holding the water bottle (or wine bottle) into place while moving around. I love this feature as well.

The part of the bag that rests upon your back, is pretty thick foam padded, with a soft nylon/spandex type gray material. Very cool to the touch and soft. The entire backpack is lightweight and comfortable on my shoulders. There is a chest buckle connected to the two straps, for extra support. If I could make an improvement to this, I would have liked to see a lower back padded support, that can be buckled around the waist. Adding that would make this perfect!

All in all, I would recommend this for anyone wanting a good hiking backpack. This may not be considered the best quality for people who spend most of their time hiking and backpacking, but if you're like me, and only hike with a backpack a handful of times per year, then I'd definitely recommend this one.

I purchased this at a promotional price to test it out and then share my thoughts, experiences and suggestions for improvement. My opinion, rating and stated experience is in no way affected or influenced by the promotional price.
summary: Perfect for what I need! Photos here!

reviewText: This is an incredibly nice backpack for the price. I am not sure I would call the color brown but maybe dark purple. Either way it looks beautiful when combined with the yellow zippers. The three main bags are perfectly sized. The main compartment has a divider in the lower half that would easily take any odds and ends that need to be kinda organized. The top compartment has a nice mesh interior pocket to hold small items like earplugs or chapstick that might otherwise fall out. The front compartment runs about half the length of the bag and is great for storage of any items like a jacket you might need access to quickly. I can't say enough good things about this backpack. I was expecting a much lower quality than the backpack I had from Lowe Alpine aND have been using for a decade. I was pleasantly surprised to find that this bag might last that long. Thank you for taking the time to watch my video or read my review. If you found it helpful, please click the This was Helpful Button. To be 100% fair, I received this product at a free or reduced price in exchange for a fair and honest review. If I find that a product does not meet my minimum expectations for what it was designed to do, For Example a medical Kit that does not have the proper equipment to do what it says it can yet at least has some value, it is generally a 2-3 Star. As far as the review, if for example its a phone case that won't really protect your phone, you will hear about it here first. I like to show all the pros and cons in my videos of a product. If something does what it is supposed to do, its worth 4 stars in my opinion. If its an Excellent Product, then I like to reward the company with a 5 Star rating. If a product utterly fails while I am testing it, it receives a 1 star.
summary: Perfect for day hikes and every day use

reviewText: ****I'm so excited to be the first redo her I never get to be the first anyway if you find my review helpful please click yes at the bottom that would really help me I would appreciate it keeps me motivated.*** Anyway I received this backpack today I do discount for an unbiased review-no it was not free I paid for it- I have to say the quality is actually really nice, I wasn't sure what to expect- If you're f familiar with the brand Jan sport- it's definitely equivalent. As you can see by the photos It has one big compartment that could easily accommodate a15- 17 inch laptop although I know it's not for laptops that's why I got it. It also has two side pockets which is perfect for water bottles. It also has a top compartment that has a zipper compartment inside of it which is perfect for me I'm a nurse and like to keep my nursing supplies separate from the rest of the bag. The back straps are padded as well as the back plate area- it's also not solid to allow for ventilation. It has two it has two elastic bungee cords toward the top to attach key or whatever. I have no negative comments about this bag at all- so far I think it's perfect for me.
summary: Great bag- I'm impressed- a LOT of room

I was so very happy when this arrived in the mail. This sweater was presented with the company's logo on the slide zip bag. When I took it out the bag I could feel the softness of the sweater. I was immediately full of excitement and  I couldn't wait to try it on. The sweater looks and feels great on. The sweater doesn't just hang on you. The sweater knit is soft and moving that it flows with every move you make. It flows beautifully whether you are walking with a big stride to hurry and catch an elevator or a slow causal romantic walk along a moonlit beach. The asymmetrical hem is gorgeous.  The sweater is a must have in anyone's wardrobe. It is so versatile that it can be worn with dress pants and dress shoes for the office and corporate meetings or worn with jeans and more casual shoes for weekend errands. This is attributed to the beautiful cowl neck making it look and feel so cozy. It looks and feels great with any shirt of your choosing dress or t-shirt underneath this sweater. The sleeves can also be worn rolled up and kept in place by fastening to the sewn on button atop or worn as long sleeves. The sleeves worn either way makes this a must have garment.
The sweater has kept its shape wash after wash no reshaping was needed for me. The stitching is done with quality that there is no bunching at all. This is a quality made sweater that is my go to no matter what I have planned for the day or night.

When I first saw the listing for this Vintage 1950s Style Dress, I immediately thought the dress was BEAUTIFUL!  When I saw the sizes, I was a bit disappointed that it only went up to an XXL when I typically wear an XXXL, but decided I'd give it a shot and hope for the best (but, to be truthful, I wasn't too optimistic that it was going to fit when I received it).  Most "vintage style" items usually run slightly smaller than the sizing states, but luckily for me, that wasn't the case at all with this dress!

I opened the package and tried on the XXL and was happy to see that, although it was slightly snug in the chest area (but NOT uncomfortable/unwearable), it FIT! - And it was GORGEOUS on!  I received the dress in the Royal Blue, but I'm sure it is gorgeous in either color - the Royal Blue is a very dark blue...almost to the point of being black.  The dress is also comfortable, which is a nice plus...I can't wait for an event to provide an opportunity for me to show off this dress!  I was also impressed that the dress came with a camisole to wear under the lace - the camisole was also comfortable and fit great...what a nice added bonus!

Overall, I was definitely impressed and would love the opportunity to try more from this company in the future.  I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.
Quality is OK, but the size was much to large on me....Have to return it.

BEAUTIFUL!

I wasn't expecting this to be the quality, fit or style that it is in person.

I'm curvy and short and lots of things look great on models but when you have it on you it's something totally different. This was not like that at all.

SUPER flattering for a curvy figure. This fits like a glove and I feel like a magazine model on Better Homes circa 1950.

The dress is very well put together. The stitch work is beyond impressive. The buttons are tight but not too tight. The collar is elegant and easy to work with.

I love the midsection; the gold buckle accent really helps give the illusion of a smaller waist though I do wish this part came with a belt or some kind of stretch belt just to add more to the illusion but this is impressive.

The skirt is beautiful. Big and full and there's pleating around the whole skirt. Made of thick fabric so could easily be worn in cooler weather.

An undershirt comes with this that's the tank top you see which actually is a lot longer than just a shirt. Could work as a short slip.

You have the option to button the whole thing or some or none and it still looks classy and tasteful.

The sleeves don't go down all the way, I love that. Has thick cuffs which you can leave down or fold up.

It's not a short dress by any means. I'm 5' 3" and this goes just past my knees. Would look super cute with a kitten heel.

This could be used for a fall/winter occasion or even for Halloween. Would also make a great theater costume so you've got options as to where/what this can be worn for.

The lace isn't rough at all. It's very soft and not totally see through either.

There's a small zipper in the back almost unnoticeable.

I'd recommend machine washing in cold water the first time and air drying it.

I definitely probably could've ordered my regular size instead of one size up. It's pretty stretchy except for the middle part.

Offers a lovely feminine silhouette. It's much nicer than I expected in quality and fabric. For any Donna Reed wannabe!

Sample provided by Halife for my evaluation and honest review.
summary: BEAUTIFUL! I wasn't expecting this to be the quality
